result.description:
Select option for UI Pages.

value = the value to use for this option
text = the text to show for this option
selected_value = the value to be automatically selected for the options in this select
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
    <g:macro value="" text="" selected_value="" />
    <j:if test="${jvar_value == jvar_selected_value}">
       <option value="${jvar_value}" selected="selected">${jvar_text}</option>
    </j:if>
    <j:if test="${jvar_value != jvar_selected_value}">
       <option value="${jvar_value}">${jvar_text}</option>
    </j:if>
</j:jelly>
result.name: ui_select_option

result.description:
ui_checkbox name="var_name"
checkbox and companion input, works in conjunction with functions		
setCheckBox and		
setCheckBoxes
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="true" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide">
    <g:macro name="REQUIRED"/>

    <j:if test="${jvar_value == 'true'}">
       <input type="checkbox" id="ni.${jvar_name}" name="ni.${jvar_name}" checked="checked" value="true" class="${jvar_class}" title="${jvar_title}" onClick="setCheckBox(this);"/>
    </j:if>
		
    <j:if test="${jvar_value != 'true'}">
	<input type="checkbox" id="ni.${jvar_name}" name="ni.${jvar_name}" value="false" title="${jvar_title}" class="${jvar_class}" onClick="setCheckBox(this);"/>
    </j:if>

    <input type="hidden" id="${jvar_name}" name="${jvar_name}" value="${jvar_value}" class="${jvar_class}"/>
</j:jelly>
result.name: ui_checkbox

result.description: override default reference lookup for kb_category field with category picker (UI page:kb_categories_dialog)
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
  <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
    <g:inline template="ie_checker.xml" />
    <g:requires name="scripts/lib/jquery_includes.js"/>
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_table_name">
		var tableName = current.getTableName();
		tableName;
	</g2:evaluate>
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_contribute_kb">
		var knowledgeBases = new SNC.KnowledgeHelper().getWritableKnowledgeBases();
		var answer = [];
		while (knowledgeBases.next())
				answer.push(knowledgeBases.getValue('sys_id'));
		answer;
	</g2:evaluate>
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_read_kb">
		var knowledgeBases = new SNC.KnowledgeHelper().getReadableKnowledgeBases();
		var answer = [];
		while (knowledgeBases.next())
				answer.push(knowledgeBases.getValue('sys_id'));
		answer;
	</g2:evaluate>
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_timeout">
		gs.minutesAgo(gs.getProperty('glide.ui.session_timeout') || 40);
	</g2:evaluate>
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_msg_lookup_picker">
		gs.getMessage("Lookup using picker");		
	</g2:evaluate>
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_aria_label_lookup_picker">
		gs.getMessage("Look up value for field: Category");		
	</g2:evaluate>		  
<script>
	var canCreateCategory='false', oldKnowledgeBase, category_link_id;
	function getCompatibleColumnWidth() {
		if ((window.frameElement) $[AMP]$[AMP] ( window.frameElement.id == 'dialog_frame')){
			return (window.frameElement.getWidth() * 0.75);
		}

		// Resize if displayed from a dialog
		return 700; // Default value for content width
	}

	function canContribute(kbId) {
		return '$[jvar_contribute_kb]'.indexOf(kbId) > -1;
	}

	function canRead(kbId) {
		return '$[jvar_read_kb]'.indexOf(kbId) > -1;
	}

	function openDialog() {
		var kb_knowledge_base = g_form.getValue('kb_knowledge_base');
		var kb_knowledge_base_gr = g_form.getReference('kb_knowledge_base');
		var table_name = g_form.getTableName();
		
		//Verify for canCreate access only if Knowledge Base is changed
		if(oldKnowledgeBase!=kb_knowledge_base){
			var ga = new GlideAjax('KBCategoryCrud');
			ga.addParam('sysparm_name','canCreate');
			ga.addParam('sysparm_id', kb_knowledge_base); // ID of parent Knowledge Base
			var responseXML = ga.getXMLWait();
			if (responseXML $[AMP]$[AMP] responseXML.documentElement) {
				canCreateCategory = responseXML.getElementsByTagName("result")[0].getAttribute("canCreateCategory");
				oldKnowledgeBase = kb_knowledge_base;
			}else{
				console.log("ERROR: Error in checking for canCreate access on category. Please check the server response below.");
				console.log(responseXML);
				canCreateCategory = 'false';
			}
		}
	
		if (!kb_knowledge_base || !kb_knowledge_base.length)
			return;

		//when kb_knowledge_base reference is not found
		if(kb_knowledge_base_gr.currentRow == -1 $[AMP]$[AMP] kb_knowledge_base_gr.rows.length==0)
			return;

		if (kb_knowledge_base_gr.kb_version === '3') {
			//Allow only those KBs to which current user can read, contribute and are created newly by him
			if (!canRead(kb_knowledge_base) $[AMP]$[AMP] !canContribute(kb_knowledge_base) $[AMP]$[AMP] !(kb_knowledge_base_gr.sys_created_by == g_user.userName $[AMP]$[AMP] kb_knowledge_base_gr.sys_created_on > '$[jvar_timeout]'))
				return ;
		}
		var disable_editing = 'false';
		if(canCreateCategory == 'false') {
			disable_editing = 'true';
		}
		var dialog = new GlideDialogWindow('kb_categories_dialog');
		dialog.setTitle('${gs.getMessage('Category picker')}');
		dialog.setSize(getCompatibleColumnWidth(), 250);
		dialog.setPreference('kb_knowledge_base', kb_knowledge_base);
		dialog.setPreference('disable_editing', disable_editing);
		dialog.setPreference('focusTrap', true);
		dialog.hideCloseButton();
		dialog.on('beforeclose', function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				if(category_link_id){		
					$j(category_link_id).focus();
				}});
		});
		dialog.render();
		var isQuirksMode = (document.compatMode !== 'CSS1Compat');
		if (!isQuirksMode) {
			// In modern browsers only: make the dialog box fixed to avoid it scrolling away while using its scrollable content.
			// Do dialog css adjustment only after whole dialog has been rendered
			dialog.on("bodyrendered", function() {
				var wndw = $j(window);
				var dlgSecPart = $j('.drag_section_part');
				dlgSecPart.css('width', 'auto').css('height', 'auto');
				dlgSecPart.css('position', 'absolute');
				dlgSecPart.css('top', Math.max(0, ((wndw.height() - dlgSecPart.outerHeight()) / 2) + wndw.scrollTop()) + 'px');
				dlgSecPart.css('left', Math.max(0, ((wndw.width() - dlgSecPart.outerWidth()) / 2) + wndw.scrollLeft()) + 'px');
	
			//Set focus to first element or add icon
				var firstListElm = $j("#body_kb_categories_dialog .colview-container .column .list-item");
				if(firstListElm.length)
					firstListElm.first().focus();
				else{
					$j("#body_kb_categories_dialog .colview-container .column .btn-add-cat").focus();
				}
			});
		}
	}

	$j(function($) {
		//doctype case in split layout
		var doctypeSplitView = '.vsplit.col-sm-6 > div';
		//doctype case in row (non split) layout
		var doctypeRowView = '.section-content > .row > .col-xs-12 > div';
		//non doctype case in split layout
		var nonDoctypeSplitView = '.vsplit_bottom_margin > tbody > tr';
		//non doctype case in row (non split) layout
		var nondoctypeRowView = '.wide > tbody > tr';

		var category_form_id = 'element.' + '$[jvar_table_name]' + '.kb_category';
		category_link_id = 'button[id="lookup.' + '$[jvar_table_name]' + '.kb_category"]';
		var init = function(selector) {
			$(selector).each(function() {
				if ($( this ).attr('id') == category_form_id){
					$( this ).find(category_link_id)
							.removeAttr("data-type" )
							.removeAttr("onclick" )
							.attr("type", "button")
							.click(openDialog)
							.removeAttr("title" )
							.attr("title", '$[jvar_msg_lookup_picker]' )
							.removeAttr("aria-label" )
							.attr("aria-label", '$[jvar_aria_label_lookup_picker]' );

				}
			});

		};
		//override of deafault onclick event will happen only for one selector that exixt on the page
		init(doctypeSplitView);
		init(doctypeRowView);
		init(nonDoctypeSplitView);
		init(nondoctypeRowView);
	});
</script>

</j:jelly>
result.name: kb_category_reference_lookup

Attributes: name= what you want to name the select table= the table from which you will select value= the initial value for the select (may be omitted if nothing is initially selected) show_popup= true/false whether the popup icon is displayed show_lookup=true/false for lookup list to display the magnifying glass or not completer= set to another completer class if you do not want AJAXReferenceCompleter (for example, AJAXTableCompleter) If you are using completer=AJAXReferenceCompleter, you can also use: columns= if you want to show additional columns in the drop down (semicolon separated list) order_by= if you want to sort matches in the drop down by a particular column query= if you want to limit the results (for example, active=true) Note for aria-labelledby: To ensure the label is associated with the input for accessibility purposes, give the label for this input an id in the format of id="_label". e.g., in a UI Page where the 'name' attribute is "vendor":
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="true" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide">
    <g:macro name="" table="" value="" displayvalue="" show_popup="true" show_lookup="true" completer="" columns="" order_by="" query="" />
    <j:set var="jvar_question_name" value="${jvar_name}"/> 
    <j:set var="jvar_question_label" value="${jvar_label}"/>  
    <j:set var="jvar_question_required" value="${jvar_required}"/>
    <j:set var="jvar_question_reference" value="${jvar_table}"/>
    <j:set var="ref" value="${jvar_question_reference}"/> 
    <j:set var="jvar_question_value" value="${jvar_value}"/> 
    <j:set var="jvar_question_display" value="${jvar_displayvalue}"/>
    <j:if test="${!empty(jvar_query)}">
       <j:set var="jvar_ref_filter" value="${jvar_query}"/>
       <j:set var="jvar_question_reference_qual" value="QUERY:${jvar_query}"/>
    </j:if>
    <j:if test="${empty(jvar_impersonate_width)}">
		<j:set var="jvar_impersonate_width" value="undefined" />
	</j:if>
    <g:inline template="lightweight_reference.xml"/>
</j:jelly>

result.description:
Choice list for the specified field and table.

Attributes: 
name= what you want to name the select (if omitted, name will be set to the value of the "field" attribute)
table= the table from which you will select
field= the column in the table to select from
result.xml:
<j:jelly trim="true" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide">
     <g:macro name="" table="" field="" />
     <g:evaluate var="jvar_not_important" expression="var cl = GlideScriptChoiceList.getChoiceList('${jvar_table}', '${jvar_field}');" />
     <g:evaluate var="jvar_usename" expression="('${jvar_name}'=='')?'${jvar_field}':'${jvar_name}'" />
     <select id="${jvar_usename}" name="${jvar_usename}">
          <g:options choiceList="${cl}" />
     </select>
</j:jelly>

result.description: Allows the ability to configure the CSS styling of the page
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<style>
.section_end {
	height: 36px;
	border: none;
}

.request_table tr.empty_row {
	border-bottom: none;
}

.last_row {
	background-color: #767676;
}

.request_table tr td.checkoutTotalSum {
	border-bottom: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
}

.sc_cv_total {
	border-left: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
}

tbody tr.sc_cv_item_row:nth-child(even) {
	background-color: #EEEEEE;
}

tbody tr.sc_cv_item_row:nth-child(odd) {
	background-color: #FFFFFF;
}

.sc_cv_price,.sc_cv_quantity,.sc_cv_total, th.sc_cv_price,th.sc_cv_quantity,th.sc_cv_total {
	text-align: right;
}

td.sc_cv_buttons {
	text-align: center;
        width: 1%;
	padding: 5px !important;
}

<g2:evaluate var="jvar_isIE6" expression="var isIE6 = GlideTransaction.get().getRequest().getHeader('user-agent').indexOf('MSIE 6') != -1 ? true : false; isIE6;" />
<g2:evaluate var="jvar_isIE7" expression="var isIE7 = GlideTransaction.get().getRequest().getHeader('user-agent').indexOf('MSIE 7') != -1 ? true : false; isIE7;" />
<g2:evaluate var="jvar_isIE8" expression="var isIE8 = GlideTransaction.get().getRequest().getHeader('user-agent').indexOf('MSIE 8') != -1 ? true : false; isIE8;" />
<j2:if test="$[jvar_isIE6 || jvar_isIE7 || jvar_isIE8]">
div.catalog_button_container button#header_button_checkout_in_footer {
        margin-top: -29px;
        margin-right: -5px;
        padding-right: 0px;
        padding-left: 0px;
}
div.catalog_button_container button#header_button_continue_shopping_in_footer {
        padding-right: 0.5em;
        padding-left: 0.5em;
        overflow: visible;
}
#sc_cv_edit_items_delete_button_id, #header_button_checkout_in_header, #header_button_continue_shopping_in_header {
        overflow: visible;
}
</j2:if>

<j2:if test="$[GlideI18NStyle.getDirection() != 'rtl']">
td.column_head .header_button {
	margin-left: 5px;
}
</j2:if>

<!-- Right to left language support such as Hebrew or Arabic -->
<j2:if test="$[GlideI18NStyle.getDirection() == 'rtl']">

td.column_head .header_button {
	float: left;
        margin-right: 5px;
}

div.caption {
	text-align: right;
}

div.checkoutLeft,td.checkout_left table {
	float: right;
}

td.checkoutLeft,td.checkout_left,th.checkout_left,td.checkout_stage,th.checkout_stage,td.checkout_description,th.checkout_description {
	text-align: right;
}

div.checkoutRight {
	float: left;
}

td.checkoutTotalSum,td.checkoutTotalLabel,div.checkoutRight,td.checkoutRight,td.checkout_total,th.checkout_total,td.checkout_price,th.checkout_price,td.checkout_quantity,th.checkout_quantity {
	text-align: left;
}

.sc_cv_price,.sc_cv_quantity,.sc_cv_total {
	text-align: left !important;
}

.sc_cv_exp_desc,.sc_cv_desc,.sc_cv_delivery_time {
	text-align: right !important;
}

th.sc_cv_exp_desc {
	border-right: 1px solid #FFFFFF;
}

td.checkoutTotalSum {
	border-right: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
	border-left: 0px;
}

tr.header td img {
        transform: rotate(180deg);
}

td.moreInfo a img[src="images/filter_hide16.gifx"] {
	transform: rotate(180deg);
}

div.catalog_button_container button#header_button_checkout_in_footer {
        float: left !important;
        margin-left: auto;
}

<j2:if test="$[jvar_isIE6 || jvar_isIE7 || jvar_isIE8]">
#sc_cv_edit_items_delete_button_id {
        overflow: auto;
}
</j2:if>
</j2:if>
</style>
</j:jelly>

result.description: Record selector for number of rows per page in the Knowledge Base
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

	<g:evaluate var="jvar_has_roles" expression="gs.installationSetting('DisplayFilter', '${ref}')"/>

	<j2:set var="sys_nav_count" value="${gs.getUser().getPreference('rowcount')}"/>
	<label for="perrows" style="display:none">Rows per Page</label>
	<select class="listbar_select" name='perrows' onchange="changeRowCount(this);" id='perrows'>
		<g2:tokenize var="jvar_c_list" delim=",">
			${gs.getProperty('glide.ui.per_page', '10,20,50,100')}
		</g2:tokenize>
		<j2:set var="jvar_foundCount" value="false" />
		<j:set var="jvar_per_page" value="${gs.getMessage('per page')}" />
		<j2:forEach var="jvar_citem" items="$[jvar_c_list]">
			<j2:if test="$[sys_nav_count != jvar_citem]">
				<option value="$[jvar_citem]"> $[jvar_citem] ${jvar_per_page}</option>
			</j2:if>
			<j2:if test="$[sys_nav_count == jvar_citem]">
				<option selected="true" value="$[jvar_citem]"> $[jvar_citem] ${jvar_per_page}</option>
				<j2:set var="jvar_foundCount" value="true" />
			</j2:if>
		</j2:forEach>
		<j2:if test="$[jvar_foundCount == false]">
			<option selected="true" value="$[sys_nav_count]"> $[sys_nav_count] </option>
		</j2:if>
	</select>
</j:jelly>
result.name: kb_page_record_select

result.description: Template Value Renderer Macro  - Used in Standard Change Proposal Record Producer
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

	<j:set var="jvar_std_change_rp" value="true"/>
	<j:set var="jvar_templ_on_table" value="change_request"/>
	
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_chgProposalId" jelly="true" expression="RP.getParameterValue('sys_id')"/>

	<g:evaluate var="jvar_template_value_readonly" jelly="true">
		var jvar_template_value_readonly = false;
		var stdChangeUtils = new StdChangeUtils();
		var gr = new GlideRecord(stdChangeUtils.TABLE_NAME_PROPOSAL);
		if(gr.get(jelly.jvar_chgProposalId)) {
			if(stdChangeUtils.isClosed(gr)) {
				jvar_template_value_readonly = true;
			}
		} 
		jvar_template_value_readonly;
	</g:evaluate>

	<g:evaluate var="jvar_chgReqId" jelly="true" expression="RP.getParameterValue('sysparm_chgReqId')"/>
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_stdChgJson" jelly="true">
		new StdChangeUtils().getFieldConfigsJson(jelly.jvar_chgReqId);
	</g:evaluate>

	<g:evaluate var="jvar_modStdChgProducer" jelly="true" expression="RP.getParameterValue('std_change_producer')"/>
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_orig_templ_values" jelly="true">
		new StdChangeUtilsSNC().getOriginalTemplate(jelly.jvar_modStdChgProducer);
	</g:evaluate>
	<g:macro_invoke macro="std_chg_template_handler"/>

	<script language="javascript">
		var g_sncStdChg = ${NOESC:jvar_stdChgJson};
		var originalTemplateVal = "${JS_STRING:jvar_orig_templ_values}"; 
		if(originalTemplateVal){
			g_sncStdChg.orig_templ_values = originalTemplateVal;
		}
	</script>

	<script language="javascript" src="StdChgProposalRPScript.jsdbx"></script>
</j:jelly>

result.description:
OK and Cancel buttons for a dialog.  Default actions are actionOK() and close (destroy) the dialog
			
			ok - you need to supply in the page's client script section
			ok_id - ID for the OK button.  Defaults to "ok_button" if not specified.
			ok_type - Defaults to "submit" but can be "button" if the button should not submit.
			cancel_id - ID for the Cancel button.  Defaults to "cancel_button" if not specified.
			cancel_type - Defaults to "submit" but can be "button" if the button should not submit.
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g:macro 
		ok="actionOK()" 
		cancel="(window.GlideDialogWindow || window.GlideModalForm).prototype.locate(this).destroy(); return false"
		ok_id="ok_button"
		cancel_id="cancel_button" 
		ok_type="submit" 
		cancel_type="submit"
		ok_text="${gs.getMessage('OK')}"
		cancel_text="${gs.getMessage('Cancel')}"
		ok_title=""
		cancel_title=""
		ok_style_class="btn btn-primary"
		cancel_style_class="btn btn-default" />
	<g:dialog_button 
		id="${jvar_cancel_id}"
		title="${jvar_cancel_title}"
		type="${jvar_cancel_type}"
		style_class="${jvar_cancel_style_class}"
		onclick="${jvar_cancel}"
                style="min-width: 5em;">${jvar_cancel_text}</g:dialog_button>$[SP]
	<g:dialog_button 
		id="${jvar_ok_id}" 
		title="${jvar_ok_title}"
		type="${jvar_ok_type}" 
		onclick="${jvar_ok}"
		style_class="${jvar_ok_style_class}" 
		style="min-width: 5em;">${jvar_ok_text}</g:dialog_button>
</j:jelly>

result.description: Add History to context menu
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
      <script>
         var mHistory = new GwtContextMenu('context_historysub${jvar_section_id}');
         mHistory.clear();
         <g2:evaluate var="jvar_url" jelly="true">
            var url = new GlideURL("history.do");
            url.set("sysparm_sys_id", __ref__.sys_id);
            url.set("sysparm_table", __ref__.getTableName());
            url.set("sysparm_view", jelly.sysparm_view);
            url.set("sysparm_nostack", "true");
            if (jelly.sysparm_record_row)
               url.set("sysparm_record_row", jelly.sysparm_record_row);
            if (jelly.sysparm_record_rows)
               url.set("sysparm_record_rows", jelly.sysparm_record_rows);
            if (jelly.sysparm_record_list )
               url.set("sysparm_record_list", encodeURIComponent(jelly.sysparm_record_list));
            new GlideTinyURL().createTinyURL(url);
         </g2:evaluate>
         mHistory.addURL("${gs.getMessage('Calendar')}", "$[jvar_url]");
         gcm.addMenu("${gs.getMessage('History')}", mHistory);

         <g:evaluate var="jvar_history_line" >
            var t = new GlideAuditor(__ref__.getTableName(), null).auditTable();
            if (t) {
               var t1 = new GlideRecord('sys_history_set');
               t = t1.canRead();
            }
         </g:evaluate>
         <g:evaluate var="jvar_cmdb_table" >
            var cmdbTable = 'cmdb_ci' == GlideDBObjectManager.getAbsoluteBase(__ref__.getTableName());
            cmdbTable;
         </g:evaluate>
         <g2:evaluate var="jvar_compatibility">
            SNC.CMDBCompatibility.checkCompatibility();
         </g2:evaluate>
      </script>

      <j:if test="${jvar_history_line}" >
         <input type="hidden" name="show_history" id="show_history" />
         <script>
            function showHistoryList(){
               if(g_form)
                  g_form.checkMandatory = false;
               if (window.g_sc_form)
                  window.g_sc_form.checkMandatory = false;
               gsftSubmit(gel('show_history'));
            }
            mHistory.addHref("${gs.getMessage('List')}", "showHistoryList()");
         </script>
         <j:if test="${pm.isActive('com.snc.cmdb')}">
            <j:if test="${jvar_cmdb_table}">
               <j2:if test="$[jvar_compatibility == 'allow']" >
                  <input type="hidden" name="show_timeline" id="show_ci_timeline" />
                  <script>
                     function showCiTimeline(){
                        if (g_form)
                           g_form.checkMandatory = false;
                        gsftSubmit(gel('show_ci_timeline'));
                     }
                     mHistory.addHref("${gs.getMessage('Timeline')}", "showCiTimeline()");
                  </script>
               </j2:if>
            </j:if>
         </j:if>
      </j:if>
</j:jelly>

result.description: CSRF validation for Password Reset Application. If violation is detected, the page will be redirected to the error page.
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

    <!-- Checking if security violation has happened or not. -->
    <g:evaluate var="jvar_is_secure" >
        var isSecure = new SNC.PwdSecurityManager().validateSecureTokenFromHttpRequest();
        <!--  If not secure, redirect the page to the error page. -->
        if(!isSecure) {
            new SNC.PwdUtil().redirect('/$pwd_error.do?sysparm_error='+ encodeURIComponent('unauthorized_access'));
        }
        isSecure;
    </g:evaluate>
</j:jelly>

result.description:
Generates table options for select tag. 
Can specify to return options for a table and all tables that extend it by passing in a table name through the 'extends_table' parameter. 
Otherwise, returns default table options.
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

  <g:evaluate var="jvar_extends_table" jelly="true">
    var extends_table = false;
    if (jelly.jvar_parent_table != '')
      extends_table = true;
    
    extends_table;
  </g:evaluate>

  <g:evaluate jelly="true">
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
    gr.orderBy('name');
    gr.query();
  </g:evaluate>

  <!-- Generate table options -->
  <j:choose>
    <!-- Parent table and tables that extend parent -->
    <j:when test="${jvar_extends_table == 'true'}">
      <j:while test="${gr.next()}">
        <g:evaluate var="jvar_extends_base_table" jelly="true">
          var extends_base_table = false;
          var base = GlideDBObjectManager.getAbsoluteBase(gr.name);
          var parent_table_array = jelly.jvar_parent_table.split(',');
          if (typeof parent_table_array === 'string') {
            if (parent_table_array == base)
              extends_base_table = true;
          } else {
            var i = parent_table_array.length;
            while (i--) {
              if (parent_table_array[i] == base) {
                extends_base_table = true;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          extends_base_table;
        </g:evaluate>
        
        <j:if test="${jvar_extends_base_table == 'true'}">
          <g:evaluate var="jvar_can_access" jelly="true">
            GlideTableDescriptor.get(gr.name).canRead();
          </g:evaluate>
          
          <j:if test="${jvar_can_access == 'true'}">
            <option value="${gr.name}">${GlideTableDescriptor.get(gr.name).getLabel()} [${gr.name}]</option>
          </j:if>
        </j:if>
      </j:while>
    </j:when>
    
    <!-- Default table options -->
    <j:otherwise>
      <g:table_options />
    </j:otherwise>
  </j:choose>

</j:jelly>
result.name: table_options_custom

result.description: (Doctype) Shows an icon on the cmdb_ci field if there are active tasks related to that CI using the task_ci many-to-many table.
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<style>
		.show_related_records_hidden {
			visibility: hidden;
			position: absolute;
			left: -1000px;
		}
	</style>
   <j:set var="jvar_n" value="show_related_tasks_${ref}"/>
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_safe_js_ref" jelly="true">
		ref = jelly.ref.split('.').join('');
	</g:evaluate>
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_show_related_active_tasks" jelly="true">
		gs.getProperty("glide.ui.task.show_related_active_tasks", false);
	</g2:evaluate>
   <g2:evaluate var="jvar_show_tasks_display" jelly="true">
      var id = __ref__.getSysIdValue();
      if (id === null || $[jvar_show_related_active_tasks] === false)
         "show_related_records_hidden";
      else {
         var ga = new GlideRecord('task_ci');
         ga.addQuery('ci_item', __ref__.getSysIdValue());
         ga.addQuery('task', '!=', jelly.sys_id);
         ga.addQuery('task.active', true);
   		 ga.setLimit(1);
         ga.query();
         if (ga.next())
            "";
         else
            "show_related_records_hidden";
      }
   </g2:evaluate>

   <button id="${jvar_n}"
		   type="button"
		   aria-haspopup="true"
		   aria-label="${gs.getMessage('Show other active tasks affecting this CI')}"
		   onclick="showTasksDialog('${ref}')"
		   name="${jvar_n}"
		   class="btn btn-ref btn-default icon-warning-circle $[jvar_show_tasks_display]"
		   tabindex="$[jvar_ua_optional_tabindex]"
		   title="${gs.getMessage('Show other active tasks')}">
   </button>

   <script>(function() {
      needsRefresh = false;
      function onChange_cmdb_${jvar_safe_js_ref}_ci_show_related(element, original, changed, loading) {
         if (needsRefresh == false) {
            needsRefresh = true;
            return;
         }
         if (changed.length == 0 || $[jvar_show_related_active_tasks] === false) {
            $('${jvar_n}').addClassName('show_related_records_hidden');
            return;
         }
         var ga = new GlideAjax('ShowRelatedTasksAjax');
         ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getRelatedTaskCount');
         ga.addParam('sysparm_ci', g_form.getValue('${ref}'));
         ga.addParam('sysparm_task', g_form.getUniqueValue());
         ga.getXML(relatedTaskReturn);
      }

      function relatedTaskReturn(response) {
         var answer = parseInt(response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer"));
         var e = $('${jvar_n}');
         if (answer > 0)
            e.removeClassName('show_related_records_hidden');
         else
		    e.addClassName('show_related_records_hidden');
      }

      var h = new GlideEventHandler('onChange_incident_${jvar_safe_js_ref}_cmdb_ci_show_related', onChange_cmdb_${jvar_safe_js_ref}_ci_show_related, '${ref}');
      g_event_handlers.push(h);

      })();

      function showTasksDialog(reference) {
         var v = g_form.getValue(reference);
         var w = new GlideDialogWindow('show_list');
         w.setTitle(getMessage('Other active tasks affecting this Configuration Item'));
         w.setPreference('table', 'task_ci_list');
         w.setPreference('sysparm_view', 'task_rel_ci');
         w.setPreference('sysparm_query', "task.active=true^task.sys_id!=" + g_form.getUniqueValue() + "^ci_item=" + v);
	     w.setPreference('focusTrap', true);
         w.render();
      }
   </script>
</j:jelly>

        <j:if test="${jvar_admin == true || jvar_personalize_list == true ||
                      jvar_personalize_form == true || jvar_personalize_dictionary == true ||
                      jvar_personalize_business_rules == true || jvar_personalize_client_scripts == true ||
                      jvar_personalize_ui_policies == true || jvar_personalize_data_policies == true ||
                      jvar_personalize_ui_actions == true}">
            <j:set var="jvar_personalizer" value="true" />
            gcm.addLine();
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_form == true}">
                <g:evaluate var="view_id" jelly="true">
                   var view_id = RP.getViewManager().getID();
                   view_id;
                </g:evaluate>
                <j:if test="${pm.isRegistered('sn_table_builder')}">
                    mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Form Builder')}", function() {
                        var url = new GlideURL('now/build/form/main/params/table/${ref}/view/${view_id}/page/views/context/platform');
                        g_navigation.open(url.getURL(), 'edit_form_builder');
                    });
                </j:if>
                <j:if test="${pm.isRegistered('com.glide.ui.ng.fd')}">
                    mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Form Design')}", function() {
                        var url = new GlideURL('$ng_fd.do');
                        url.addParam('sysparm_attributes', 'startTable:"${ref}",startView:"${ view_id }"');
						g_navigation.open(url.getURL(), 'edit_form_design');
                    });
                </j:if>
                <g:set_if test="${GlideMobileExtensions.getDeviceType() == 'doctype'}" var="jvar_form_layout" true="auto" false="${jvar_section_id}"/>
                mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Form Layout')}", function() { personalizer('${jvar_form_layout}', 'section'); });
            </j:if>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_list == true}">
              <j:if test="${sysparm_view != 'sys_popup'}">
                mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Related Lists')}", function() { personalizer('${ref}', 'related_list'); });
              </j:if>
            </j:if>
            mModify.addLine();
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalizer == true}">
                mModify.addURL("${gs.getMessage('All')}", "personalize_all.do?sysparm_rules_table=${ref}$[AMP]sysparm_rules_label=$[GlideMetaData.getTablePlural('${ref}')]");
            </j:if>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_dictionary == true}">
                mModify.addURL("${gs.getMessage('Table')}", "sys_db_object.do?sys_id=${ref}$[AMP]sysparm_refkey=name");
            </j:if>
			<j:if test="${jvar_personalize_security == true}">
				mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Security Rules')}", function() { listSecurity('table', '${ref}'); });
			</j:if>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_business_rules == true }">
                mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Business Rules')}", function() { listCollection('sys_script', 'collection', '${ref}', '${JS:sysparm_view}'); });
            </j:if>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_client_scripts == true }">
                mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Client Scripts')}", function() { listCollection('sys_script_client', 'table', '${ref}', '${JS:sysparm_view}'); });
            </j:if>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_ui_policies == true }">
				mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('UI Policies')}", function() { listCollection('sys_ui_policy', 'table', '${ref}', '${JS:sysparm_view}'); });
            </j:if>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_data_policies == true }">
				mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Data Policies')}", function() { listCollection('sys_data_policy2', 'model_table', '${ref}', '${JS:sysparm_view}'); });
            </j:if>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_ui_actions == true }">
				mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('UI Actions')}", function() { listCollection('sys_ui_action', 'table', '${ref}', '${JS:sysparm_view}'); });
            </j:if>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_notifications == true}">
				mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Notifications')}", function() { listCollection('sysevent_email_action', 'collection', '${ref}', '${JS:sysparm_view}'); });
            </j:if>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_dictionary == true}">
                mModify.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Dictionary')}", function() { personalizeFields('${ref}', 'sys_dictionary_list.do'); });
            </j:if>
            gcm.addMenu("${gs.getMessage('Configure')}", mModify, "context_configuremenu");
        </j:if>

        </script>
            <g:template_context />
        <script>

        var mExport = new GwtContextMenu('context_pdfsub${jvar_section_id}');
        mExport.setTableName('${ref}');
        mExport.clear();
		<j2:if test="$[jvar_context_menu_export_pdf == true]">

				var gdw = new GlideModal("export_to_pdf", false, 400);

				gdw.setPreference("sysparm_sys_id", '$[${ref}.sys_id]');

				gdw.setPreference("sysparm_domain", '$[JS:jvar_form_domain]');
				gdw.render();
			});
		</j2:if>
		<j2:if test="$[jvar_context_menu_export_xml == true]">
			mExport.addURL("${gs.getMessage('XML (This Record)')}", "${ref}.do?UNL$[AMP]sysparm_query=sys_id=$[${ref}.sys_id]");
        </j2:if>
		<j2:if test="$[jvar_context_menu_export_pdf == true || jvar_context_menu_export_xml == true]">
        	gcm.addMenu("${gs.getMessage('Export')}", mExport, "context_exportmenu");

        <j2:if test="$[${ref}.isNewRecord() == false]" >
            <j2:if test="$[jvar_view_select]">

    <j:if test="${gs.getProperty('glide.ui.label.enable','true')}">

	<j2:if test="$[pm.isActive('com.glide.ui.ui16') == true ${AND} gs.getUser().getPreference('use.concourse') == 'true']">

			</j:otherwise>
		</j:choose>

		<j2:if test="$[jvar_context_menu_copy_sysid]">
			gcm.addHref("${gs.getMessage('Copy sys_id')}", "copyToClipboard('$[${ref}.sys_id]');");
		</j2:if>
        <j2:if test="$[jvar_context_menu_show_xml and !jvar_is_new_record]" >
			gcm.addHref("${gs.getMessage('Show XML')}", "xmlView('${ref}', '$[${ref}.sys_id]');");
		</j2:if>
    </script>

		<j2:if test="$[jvar_session.hasRole(jvar_historyrole) ${AND} !jvar_is_scriptable_table]">
			<j2:if test="$[${ref}.isNewRecord() == false]" >
				<g:history_context />
			</j2:if>
		</j2:if>

    <script>
		gcm.addHref("${gs.getMessage('Reload form')}", "reloadWindow(window);");
    </script>
</j:jelly>

result.description: Checklists can be added to any forms using this macro
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<j2:if test="$[!RP.isPopup()]">
		<g2:evaluate>
			var isBrowserSupported = (GlideVTBCompatibility.getCompatibility() != 'block');
			var isNewUI = gs.getProperty('glide.ui.doctype', 'false') == 'true';
			var isNewRecord = true;
			if (isBrowserSupported $[AMP]$[AMP] isNewUI) {
				var sysID = current.getUniqueValue();
				var tableName = current.getTableName();
				isNewRecord = current.isNewRecord();

				// get the checklist ID for this record
				var checklistID = null;
				var checklist = new GlideRecord("checklist");
				checklist.addQuery("document", sysID);
				checklist.addQuery("table", tableName);
				checklist.query();
				if (checklist.next())
					checklistID = checklist.getUniqueValue();
			}
		</g2:evaluate>
		<body>
			<j2:if test="$[!isNewRecord]">
				<g:macro_invoke macro="checklist_template" readonly="false" record="$[sysID]" 
								table="$[tableName]" checklistid="$[checklistID]"/>
			</j2:if>
		</body>
 	</j2:if>
</j:jelly>

result.description: Used to override the module context menu just for UI11.
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<j:if test="${gs.hasRole('admin')}">
		<j:if test="${gs.getProperty('glide.ui.app_menu_context', 'true')}">
			<j:set var="jvar_show_app_context" value="true"/>
			<script language="javascript">
				function showModuleContext(event, id) {
		  			var mcm = new GwtContextMenu('context_menu_module_' +id);
	 				mcm.clear();
		  			mcm.addURL("${gs.getMessage('Edit Module')}", "sys_app_module.do?sys_id=" + id, "gsft_main");
                                        
                                        // Ensure the top window is correct
                                        var w = getTopWindow();
                                        if (w.location.pathname $[AMP]$[AMP] w.location.pathname.match(/\/navpage11.do/)) {
		  			  mcm.addFunc("${gs.getMessage('Add Bookmark')}", function() {
                                            // Looks like the only way to get the link is in the DOM. If we can do this on
                                            // the server then it would be easier.
                                            var elem = $(id);
                                            CustomEvent.fireTop('add_bookmark', {
                                              type: 'module',
                                              moduleID: id,
                                              href: elem.readAttribute('href')
                                            });
                                          });
                                        }

					return contextShow(event, mcm.getID(), 500, 0, 0);
				}
				function showAppContext(event, id) {
					var acm = new GwtContextMenu('context_menu_app_' +id);
					acm.clear();
					acm.addURL("${gs.getMessage('Edit Application Menu')}", "sys_app_application.do?sys_id=" + id, "gsft_main");
					return contextShow(event, acm.getID(), 500, 0, 0);
				}
			</script>
		</j:if>
	</j:if>
</j:jelly>

result.description: context menu for variables
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_personalizer" expression="gs.hasRole('personalize') || gs.hasRole('catalog_admin')" />
	<j:if test="${jvar_personalizer}">
		<g:evaluate jelly="true">
			var sc_context_menu_table = 'item_option_new';
			var sc_edit_variable = gs.getMessage('Configure Variable');
			var sc_edit_variable_msg = gs.getMessage('Edit the definition of this Variable');
			if (jelly.sysparm_variable_type ${AMP}${AMP} jelly.sysparm_variable_type == 'container') {
				sc_context_menu_table = 'item_option_new_set';
				sc_edit_variable =  gs.getMessage('Configure Variable Set');
				sc_edit_variable_msg = gs.getMessage('Edit the definition of this Variable Set');
			}
		</g:evaluate>
        <g:evaluate expression="var sc_watch_variable = gs.getMessage('Watch Variable');" />
        <g:evaluate expression="var sc_unwatch_variable = gs.getMessage('Unwatch Variable');" />
        <g:evaluate expression="var sc_watch_variable_msg = gs.getMessage('Logs changes related to this variable');" />
		<g:evaluate expression="var sc_unwatch_variable_msg = gs.getMessage('Stop watching this variable');" />
		<script language="javascript">
			// we should display context menu only on catalog item page
			if(ServiceCatalogForm ${AMP}${AMP} (g_form instanceof ServiceCatalogForm)) {
				var id = "${sysparm_catalog_id}";
				var variableId = "${sysparm_variable_id}";
				var variableType = "${sysparm_variable_type}"  || null;

				var gcm = new GwtContextMenu('context_question_label');
				gcm.setTableName('${sc_context_menu_table}');
				gcm.clear();
	
				gcm.addHref("${sc_edit_variable}", "showItem('${sc_context_menu_table}', 'sys_id', rowSysId)", "", "${sc_edit_variable_msg}");
				
				if(variableType != 'container' ${AMP}${AMP} canHaveWatchMenu()) {
					// 11: Label, 12: Break, 19: Container start, 20: Container end, 24: Container split, 14: Macro, 17: Macro with Label
					if(variableType ${AMP}${AMP} variableType !== '11' ${AMP}${AMP} variableType !== '32' ${AMP}${AMP} variableType !== '12' ${AMP}${AMP} variableType !== '19' ${AMP}${AMP} variableType !== '20' ${AMP}${AMP} variableType !== '24' ${AMP}${AMP} variableType !== '0' ${AMP}${AMP} variableType !== '14' ${AMP}${AMP} variableType !== '17') {
						if (showUnWatchMenu()) {
							gcm.addHref("${sc_unwatch_variable}", "clearWatchField(id+ '.IO:'+ rowSysId)", "", "${sc_unwatch_variable_msg}");
						} else {
							gcm.addHref("${sc_watch_variable}", "showWatchField(id+ '.IO:'+ rowSysId)", "", "${sc_watch_variable_msg}");
						}
					}
				}
			}

			function canHaveWatchMenu() {
                // We're checking document location against top to see if the full real estate is available
                // or if we're isolated in a single page (Field Watcher panel not available).
				return top.document.location.href != document.location.href;
			}
			function showUnWatchMenu() {
                return ((id+ '.IO:'+ variableId === '${gs.getSession().getWatchField()}') ? true : false);
            }
		</script>
	</j:if>
</j:jelly>
result.name: variable_context

result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

<g:evaluate var="jvar_table_exists" jelly="true">
  var grTable = new GlideRecordSecure(jelly.jvar_table);
  grTable.isValid();
</g:evaluate>

<j:if test="${jvar_table_exists}">

  <g:evaluate var="jvar_field_list" jelly="true">
    var blacklistedFields = new GlideTableDescriptor("sys_import_set_row").getActiveFieldNames();
    var allFields = new GlideSysList(jelly.jvar_table).getListRecords();
    var fields = ["sys_import_row", "template_import_log.message"];
    for (var i = 0; i != allFields.size(); i++) {
      if (!blacklistedFields.contains(allFields.get(i)))
        fields.push(allFields.get(i));
    }
    GlideStringUtil.join(fields);
  </g:evaluate>

  <g:list_custom table="${jvar_table}" view="" elements="${jvar_field_list}"/>

	<!-- Set up ListProperties for the list -->
	<g:evaluate>
		ListProperties.setHasTopNav(true);
		ListProperties.setHasTitle(true);
		ListProperties.setHasTitleContextMenu(false);
		ListProperties.setHasFilter(true);
		ListProperties.setHasBreadcrumbs(true);
		ListProperties.setHasSearch(true);
		ListProperties.setHasTopVCR(true);
		ListProperties.setHasHeader(true);
		ListProperties.setHasHeaderContextMenu(false);
		ListProperties.setHasListMechanic(true);
		ListProperties.setHasRowContextMenu(true);
		ListProperties.setShowLinks(true);
		ListProperties.setHasPopup(true);
		ListProperties.setShowEmpty(true);
		ListProperties.setHasBottomNav(true);
		ListProperties.setHasActions(false);
		ListProperties.setHasBottomVCR(true);
		ListProperties.setCanChangeView(false);
		ListProperties.setCanGroup(true);
	</g:evaluate>

	<j2:set var="sysparm_query" value="${jvar_list_query}" />
	<!-- register for list printing -->
	<j:set var="jvar_handle_list_printing" value="true" />

	<!-- and build the list output -->
	<g:inline template="list2_default.xml" />

</j:if>

</j:jelly>

result.description: Add label entries to the action pulldown list
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<j:if test="${!__ref__.getED().getBooleanAttribute('no_labels', false)}">
	    <g:evaluate>
	        var label_list = GlideLabelUtil.getRecentDisplayLabelsForUser(9);
	        var more_labels_available = (label_list.size() == 9);
	        if (more_labels_available)
	            label_list.remove(8);
	    </g:evaluate>
		<optgroup label=" ${gs.getMessage('Assign Tag')}:">
		    <j:set var="jvar_new_name" value="${gs.getMessage('New Tag')}"/>
		    <option client="true"
					href="newLabelPromptListAction('${jvar_ref}', '$[jvar_list_id]');"
					disabled='true'
					gsft_base_label="${jvar_new_name}"
					gsft_row="true"
					label="${jvar_new_name}"
					aria-label="${gs.getMessage('Assign Tag')} ${jvar_new_name}"
					gsft_is_action="true">
				${SP}${SP}${SP}${jvar_new_name}
	    	</option>

			<j:forEach var="jvar_label" items="${label_list}">
				<g:evaluate var="jvar_label_display" jelly="true" expression="GlideStringUtil.escapeHTML(jelly.jvar_label);"/>
				<option
					 class="list_action_option ${jvar_list_css}"
					 gsft_check_condition="false"
					 gsft_base_label="${jvar_label}"
					 gsft_is_action="true"
					 client="true"
					 aria-label="${gs.getMessage('Assign Tag')} ${NOESC:jvar_label_display}"
					 href="assignLabelToCheckedSysIds('${JS:jvar_label}', '${jvar_ref}', '$[jvar_list_id]')">
					${SP}${SP}${SP}${NOESC:jvar_label_display}
				</option>
			</j:forEach>
		</optgroup>
	    <j:set var="jvar_more_name" value="${gs.getMessage('More...')}"/>
	    <j:if test="${more_labels_available}">
	    <option client="true" href="assignLabelActionViaLookupModal('${jvar_ref}', '$[jvar_list_id]');" disabled='true' gsft_base_label="${jvar_more_name}" gsft_row="true" gsft_is_action="true" aria-label="${gs.getMessage('Assign Tag')} ${jvar_more_name}">${SP}${SP}${SP}${jvar_more_name}
	    </option>
	    </j:if>

	    <j:if test="${label_list.size() > 0}">
	        <optgroup label="${gs.getMessage('Remove Tag')}:">
				<j:forEach var="jvar_label" items="${label_list}">
					<g:evaluate var="jvar_label_display" jelly="true" expression="GlideStringUtil.escapeHTML(jelly.jvar_label);"/>
					<option
					 class="list_action_option ${jvar_list_css}"
					 gsft_check_condition="false"
					 gsft_base_label="${jvar_label}"
					 gsft_is_action="true"
					 client="true"
					 aria-label="${gs.getMessage('Remove Tag')} ${NOESC:jvar_label_display}"
					 href="removeLabelFromCheckedSysIds('${JS:jvar_label}', '$[jvar_list_id]')">${SP}${SP}${SP}${NOESC:jvar_label_display}</option>
				</j:forEach>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
    <g:evaluate var="jvar_frame_url">
	// optionally remove javascript: prefix from iFrame URL before rendering content block
        if (gs.getProperty('glide.ui.content_block.iframe.strip_javascript') === 'true')
            current.url = GlideSecurityUtils.cleanURL(current.url);
        var current_url = new GlideURL(current.url);
        current_url.set("sysparm_nameofstack", GlideGuid.generate(null));
        current_url.set("sysparm_clear_stack", "yes");
        var url = current_url.toString();
        url;
    </g:evaluate>
    <j:if test="${current.sizing != 'expand'}">
        <iframe class="content_embedded" frameborder="0" style="height:${current.height}px;width:${current.width}px" src="${jvar_frame_url}" name="${current.frame_name}"/>
    </j:if>
    <j:if test="${current.sizing == 'expand'}">
        <g:set_if test="${current.frame_name.nil()}" var="jvar_frame_name" true="${current.sys_id}" false="${current.frame_name}" />
        <iframe width="100%" height="100%" name="${jvar_frame_name}" id="${jvar_frame_name}"  frameborder="0" border="0" allowtransparency="true" src="${jvar_frame_url}" scrolling="no"/>
        <script>
            (function() {
                CustomEvent.observe('content_frame.resized', contentFrameResized);
                CustomEvent.observe('content_frame.loaded', contentFrameResized);
                var isFirefox = navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Firefox') > -1;

                function contentFrameResized(name, height) {
                    if (!name)
                        return;

                    var f = $(name);
                    if (!f)
                        return;

					if(window.SNC) {
						if(window.SNC.size) {
							if(window.SNC.size.height) {
								_resize(f, window.SNC.size.height);
								return;
							}
						}
					}
                    // avoid using an AND here
                    if (!isFirefox || height == 10)
                        _resize(f, height);
                    else {
                        // delay resize for firefox
                        setTimeout(function() {
                            _resize(f, height);
                        }, 0);                        
                    }
                }

                function _resize(f, height) {
					if (!height) {
						f.height = f.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + "px";
					} else
						f.height = height;
                }
			
				$('${jvar_frame_name}').on('load', function() {
					window.scrollTo(0, 0);
				});
            })();
        </script>
    </j:if>
</j:jelly>

result.description: Java script that requires server side data for security question and answer enrollment in Password Rest plugin.
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>

<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

    <script type="text/javascript">
        
        // When the page gets loaded, call the questions_and_answers_on_load method for on-load event.
        addAfterPageLoadedEvent (
            function() { 
                questions_and_answers_on_load('${jvar_form_id}');
            },
			'${jvar_form_id}'
        );
        
        // When the page gets loaded, register the event hanlder for on-submit event for the form.
        addSubmitEvent (
            function() { 
                return questions_and_answers_on_submit('${jvar_form_id}');
            },
			'${jvar_form_id}'
        );

        /**
        * Returns all available questions from the db. 
        */
        function getAllQuestions_${jvar_verification_id}(){
    
            var arr = [];
            <j:forEach begin="0" end="${jvar_questions.size()-1}" indexVar="questionIndex" >
                arr.push("${jvar_questions.get(questionIndex)}");
            </j:forEach>
            return arr;
        }
		
		<g:evaluate var="jvar_stored_answer_size" jelly="true">
			var size = 0;
			if (jelly.jvar_stored_answer_ids != undefined) {
				size = jelly.jvar_stored_answer_ids.size();
			}
			size;
		</g:evaluate>
		
        /**
        * Traverse all the stored questions and returns the array of the questions. 
        */
        function getAllStoredQuestions_${jvar_verification_id}(){
            var arr = [];
            <j:forEach begin="0" end="${jvar_stored_answer_size - 1}" indexVar="questionIndex" >
                <j:set var="jvar_id" value="${jvar_stored_answer_ids.get(questionIndex)}" />
                    <g:evaluate var="jvar_question" jelly="true" >
                        jelly.jvar_mgr.getStoredQuestionByAnswerId(jelly.jvar_id);
                    </g:evaluate>
                arr.push("${jvar_question}");
            </j:forEach>
            return arr;
        }
        /**
        * Traverse all the stored questions and returns the array of the questions. 
        */
        function getAllStoredAnswers_${jvar_verification_id}(){
            var arr = [];
            <j:forEach begin="0" end="${jvar_stored_answer_size - 1}" indexVar="questionIndex" >
                <j:set var="jvar_id" value="${jvar_stored_answer_ids.get(questionIndex)}" />
                    <g:evaluate var="jvar_answer" jelly="true" >
                        jelly.jvar_mgr.getStoredAnswerById(jelly.jvar_id);
                    </g:evaluate>
                arr.push("${jvar_answer}");
            </j:forEach>
            return arr;
        }
        /**
        * Traverse all the stored questions and returns the array of the questions. 
        */
        function getAllStoredAnswerSysIds_${jvar_verification_id}(){
            var arr = [];
            <j:forEach begin="0" end="${jvar_stored_answer_size - 1}" indexVar="questionIndex" >
                <j:set var="jvar_id" value="${jvar_stored_answer_ids.get(questionIndex)}" />
                arr.push("${jvar_id}");
            </j:forEach>
            return arr;
        }
    </script>
</j:jelly>
result.name: $pwd_enroll_questions_ui_js

result.description: Create a context menu for switching the view for both lists and forms
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> 
        <g:macro id="" table="" type="" first_form_section="false" />
        <j:set var="jvar_t" value="${JS:sysparm_view}" />
        <g:evaluate jelly="true" var="jvar_build_context">
           var view = jelly.jvar_t;
           var b = true;
           if (RP.isPortal() || RP.isPopup() || view == "sys_ref_list")
              b = false;
           b;
        </g:evaluate>
        <j:if test="${jvar_build_context}" >
        <j2:if test="$[jvar_view_changer == true]">
        <g:evaluate var="jvar_views" object="true" jelly="true" >
            var vm = RP.getViewManager();
            vm.setTable(jelly.ref);
            vm.setTarget('${jvar_type}');
            vm.getList(RP);
        </g:evaluate> 
        <j:if test="${jvar_views.size() > 0}" >
            var cmViews = new GwtContextMenu('${jvar_id}',${jvar_first_form_section});
	    cmViews.clear();
	    cmViews.setTableName('${jvar_table}');
            var views_sa = new GwtContextMenu('context_labelMenu',${jvar_first_form_section});
            views_sa.clear();

            <j:forEach var="jvar_view" items="${jvar_views}" >
               <j:if test="${jvar_view.selected=='true'}">
                  <j:set var="jvar_img" value="images/checked.pngx" />
               </j:if>
               <j:if test="${jvar_view.selected!='true'}">
                  <j:set var="jvar_img" value="images/s.gifx" />
               </j:if>
	       cmViews.addHref("${HTML:jvar_view.label}", "switchView('${jvar_type}','${jvar_table}','${JS:jvar_view.value}')", "${jvar_img}");
	       views_sa.addHref("${HTML:jvar_view.label}", "switchView('${jvar_type}','${jvar_table}','${JS:jvar_view.value}')", "${jvar_img}");
            </j:forEach>
	    gcm.addMenu('${gs.getMessage('uppercase_view')}', cmViews);
        </j:if>
        </j2:if>
        </j:if>
</j:jelly>
result.name: view_context

result.description:
Used by personalize_all ui page to display a tabbed list of records related to table configuration.
Usage
<g:call function="personalize_all_list.xml" table="TABLE_TO_QUERY" source="QUERY_FOR_TABLE" table_field="FIELD_TO_QUERY_FOR_TABLE"/>
Business rules example:
<g:call function="personalize_all_list.xml" table="sys_script" source="${sysparm_rules_table}" table_field="collection"/>

Special case for security rules
<g:call function="personalize_all_list.xml" table="sys_security_acl" source="${sysparm_rules_table}.*"/>

Special case for dictionary 
<g:call function="personalize_all_list.xml" table="sys_dictionary" table_field="name"/>
<g:call function="personalize_all_list.xml" table="sys_dictionary_override" table_field="name"/>

Special case for flows
<g:call function="personalize_all_list.xml" table="sys_hub_flow" source="list of flow sys_ids " table_field="sys_id"/>
Flow must use OR query with a list of sys_id to get correct flows
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

<g:evaluate var="jvar_table_exists" jelly="true">
	var tableExistsAnswer = true;
	var grTable = new GlideRecord(jelly.jvar_table);
	if (!grTable.isValid() || !GlideSecurityManager.tableLevelACLAllow(grTable, "read"))
		tableExistsAnswer = false;
	tableExistsAnswer;
</g:evaluate>

<j:if test="${jvar_table_exists}">

	<g:list_default table="${jvar_table}" view="" />

	<!-- Set up ListProperties for the list -->
	<g:evaluate jelly="true">
		ListProperties.setHasTopNav(true);
		ListProperties.setHasTitle(true);
		ListProperties.setHasTitleContextMenu(true);
		ListProperties.setHasFilter(true);
		ListProperties.setHasBreadcrumbs(true);
		ListProperties.setHasSearch(true);
		ListProperties.setHasTopVCR(true);
		ListProperties.setHasHeader(true);
		ListProperties.setHasHeaderContextMenu(true);
		ListProperties.setHasListMechanic(true);
		ListProperties.setHasRowContextMenu(true);
		ListProperties.setShowLinks(true);
		ListProperties.setHasPopup(true);
		ListProperties.setShowEmpty(true);
		ListProperties.setHasBottomNav(true);
		ListProperties.setHasActions(true);
		ListProperties.setHasBottomVCR(true);
		ListProperties.setCanChangeView(true);
		ListProperties.setCanGroup(true);
		if (((jelly.jvar_table || '') + '') == 'sys_hub_flow') {
			var sysIds = ((jelly.jvar_source || '') + '');
			var sysIdList = sysIds.split(',');
			var collectionQuery = '';
			var queryGen = new GlideCollectionQueryCalculator();
			var collectionQuery = queryGen.buildQueryClause('true', 'active') + '^';
			sysIdList.forEach( function(id, index, arr) {
				collectionQuery += queryGen.buildQueryClause(id, (jelly.jvar_table_field || '') + '');
				if (index != arr.length - 1)
					collectionQuery += '^OR';
			});
		}
		else if (((jelly.jvar_table || '') + '') == 'sys_security_acl') {
			var queryGen = new GlideSecurityQueryCalculator();
			var collectionQuery = queryGen.calculate((jelly.jvar_source || '') + '');
		}
		else if ((((jelly.jvar_table || '') + '') == 'sys_dictionary' || ((jelly.jvar_table || '') + '') == 'sys_dictionary_override') && 
					((jelly.jvar_table_field || '') + '') == 'name') {
			var queryGen = new GlideCollectionQueryCalculator();
			var collectionQuery = queryGen.buildDictionaryQueryClause((jelly.jvar_source || '') + '');
		} else {
			var queryGen = new GlideCollectionQueryCalculator();
			var collectionQuery = queryGen.buildQueryClause((jelly.jvar_source || '') + '', (jelly.jvar_table_field || '') + '');
		}    
	</g:evaluate>

	<j2:set var="sysparm_query" value="${collectionQuery}" />
	<!-- register for list printing -->
	<j:set var="jvar_handle_list_printing" value="true" />

	<!-- and build the list output -->
	<g:inline template="list2_default.xml" />

</j:if>

</j:jelly>
result.name: personalize_all_list

result.description:
Show the Workflow map when the workflow field reference is not null  
Activate by adding the attribute: ref_contributions=show_workflow
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide"
	xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_is_running_tablet">
		var isRunningTablet = GlideMobileExtensions.runningTablet();
		isRunningTablet;
	</g:evaluate>
	<j:if test="${!jvar_is_running_tablet}">
		<g:reference_decoration id="show_workflow.${ref}" field="${ref}"
			onclick="showWorkflow('${ref}');" title="${gs.getMessage('Show Workflow')}"
			image="images/workflow/wkfl_definition.gifx" />
	</j:if>

	<script>
		function showWorkflow(reference) {
			var s = reference.split('.');
			var referenceField = s[1];
			var workflowId = g_form.getValue(referenceField);
	
			var url = new GlideURL('workflow_ide.do');
			url.addParam('sysparm_wf_id', workflowId);
			var w = getHighestParentWith("popupOpenFocus");
			w.popupOpenFocus(url.getURL(), 'show_workflow_version', 950, 700, '', false, false);

			function getHighestParentWith(prop) {
				var topWin = window.self;
				try {
					while (topWin !== window $[AND] topWin.parent[prop]) {
						topWin = topWin.parent;
					}
				} catch(e) {}

				return topWin;
			}
		}
	</script>
</j:jelly>
result.name: show_workflow

result.description:
show user incidents popup link
			activate by:
			- set the active field in this macro to true
			- adding the attribute to a dictionary field:
			ref_contributions=user_show_incidents
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:evaluate var="jvar_guid" expression="gs.generateGUID(this);" />
<j:set var="jvar_n" value="show_incidents_${jvar_guid}:${ref}"/>
<g:reference_decoration id="${jvar_n}" field="${ref}"
  onclick="showRelatedList('${ref}'); "
  title="${gs.getMessage('Show related incidents')}" image="images/icons/tasks.gifx" icon="icon-tree-right"/>
<g:inline template="list2_js_includes.xml"/>
<script>
// show related list
(function() {
	function decorationShow(element, original, changed, loading) {
		var $refButton = $j(gel('${jvar_n}'));
		$refButton.attr('role', 'button');
		}
	var n = '${jvar_n}'.replace(/./g, '');
	var h = new GlideEventHandler('onLoad' + n, decorationShow, '${ref}');
	g_event_handlers.push(h);
})();
function showRelatedList(reference) {
	try {
		var displayValue = g_form.getDisplayBox(reference).value;
		var title = new GwtMessage().getMessage("Showing records related to: {0} ", displayValue);
		var s = reference.split('.');
		var referenceField = s[s.length - 1];
		var query = referenceField + '=' + g_form.getValue(reference);

		var gdw = new GlideModal('show_list');
		gdw.setTitle(title);
		gdw.setSize(750);
		gdw.setPreference('focusTrap', true);
		gdw.setPreference('table', 'incident_list');
		gdw.setPreference('sysparm_query', query);
		gdw.setPreference('title', 'A New Title');
		gdw.render();
	} catch (e) {
		jslog('error showing related list');
		jslog(e);
	}
}

</script>
</j:jelly>
result.name: user_show_incidents

<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

<script>

function displayCleanBase(flag) {
  g_form.setDisplay('clean_base_rotation', flag);
}

function updateCleanBase() {
  g_form.setValue('clean_base_rotation', _getTime());
}

function _getTime() {
  var ajax = new GlideAjax('TableRotationCleanTime');
  ajax.addParam('sysparm_name','getCleanTime');
  ajax.addParam('sysparm_rotation_count', g_form.getValue('rotations'));
  ajax.addParam('sysparm_rotation_duration', g_form.getValue('duration'));
  ajax.getXMLWait();
  return ajax.getAnswer();
}

</script>

</j:jelly>

result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g:evaluate jelly="true" >
		
		var ancestors = new TableUtils(jelly.sysparm_table).getTables();
		ancestors = ancestors.toString();
		ancestors = ancestors.replace("[", "");
		ancestors = ancestors.replace("]", "");
		ancestors = ancestors.replace(" ", "");
		
		var field_list = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
		field_list.addQuery('name', 'IN', ancestors);
		field_list.addQuery('internal_type', '!=', 'collection');
		field_list.orderBy('element');
		field_list.query();

		var tableName = jelly.sysparm_table;
	</g:evaluate>
	<select id="${jvar_rest_var_hashed}_rest_var_select" class="form-control select2" >
		<j:while test="${field_list.next()}">
			<j:if test="${field_list.internal_type == 'reference'}">
				<option value="${field_list.element}:${field_list.reference}:${field_list.getDisplayValue('reference')}">${field_list.column_label}</option>
			</j:if>
			<j:if test="${field_list.internal_type != 'reference'}">
				<option value="${field_list.element}">${field_list.column_label}</option>
			</j:if>
		</j:while>
		<option id="${jvar_rest_var_hashed}_showRelated_option" value="showRelated">Show Related Fields</option>
	</select>
</j:jelly>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_field_type" object="true" jelly="true">
		var type = jelly.jvar_cc_field.type;
		type;
	</g:evaluate>
	<j:choose> 
		<j:when test="${jvar_field_type=='reference'}">
			<g:macro_invoke macro="cc_reference_field" cc_reference_field="${jvar_cc_field}" />
		</j:when>
		<j:when test="${jvar_field_type=='file'}">
			<g:macro_invoke macro="cc_file_field" cc_file_field="${jvar_cc_field}" />
		</j:when>
		<j:when test="${jvar_field_type=='radio'}">
			<g:macro_invoke macro="cc_radio_field" cc_radio_field="${jvar_cc_field}"/>
		</j:when>
		<j:when test="${jvar_field_type=='password'}">
			<g:macro_invoke macro="cc_password_field" cc_password_field="${jvar_cc_field}"/>
		</j:when>
		<j:when test="${jvar_field_type=='checkbox'}">
			<g:macro_invoke macro="cc_checkbox_field" cc_checkbox_field="${jvar_cc_field}"/>
		</j:when>
		<j:when test="${jvar_field_type=='mid_selection'}">
			<g:macro_invoke macro="cc_mid_selection_field" cc_mid_selection_field="${jvar_cc_field}"/>
		</j:when>
		<j:otherwise>
			<g:macro_invoke macro="cc_text_field" cc_text_field="${jvar_cc_field}"/>
		</j:otherwise>
	</j:choose>
	<script>
	function updateMandatoryMarker(inputId, labelId){
		var inputNode = gel(inputId);
		var labelNode = gel(labelId);
		if(inputNode.value){
			labelNode.removeClassName('required-field');
		}
		else{
			labelNode.removeClassName('required-field');
			labelNode.addClassName('required-field ');
		}
	}
	</script>

</j:jelly>
result.name: cc_field

result.description: Macro to bring up glide list for change requests
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<j:set var="jvar_html_identifier" value="std_change_proposal.change_requests"/>
	<j:set var="jvar_tab_name" value="change_request"/>
	<j:set var="jvar_list_title" value='${gs.getMessage("Change Requests")}'/>
	<j:set var="jvar_isDoctype" value="$[GlideMobileExtensions.getDeviceType()]" />
	<j:if test="$[jvar_isDoctype != 'doctype']">
		<g:macro_invoke macro="std_chg_glide_list_handler_non_doc"/>
	</j:if>
	<j:if test="$[jvar_isDoctype == 'doctype']">
		<g:macro_invoke macro="std_chg_glide_list_handler"/>
	</j:if>
	<script>
		//This will be used to get the final value in the submit event handling
		var sncSampleChangesPlaceHolder = '${jvar_html_identifier}';


		addRenderEvent(function() {
			g_form.setDisplay('variables.change_requests',false);
			//Coming from Change Request > Propose a Standard Change.
			var chgReqId = getParmVal('sysparm_chgReqId');
			if(chgReqId){
				setListAndShortDesc(chgReqId);
			}
		});

		function setListAndShortDesc(chgReqId) {
			var chgGR = new GlideRecord('change_request');
			chgGR.get(chgReqId);
			var displayVal=chgGR.getValue('number');
			var shortDesc=chgGR.getValue('short_description');
			g_form.setValue('variables.short_description',shortDesc);
			addChoiceExternal('${jvar_html_identifier}',chgReqId,displayVal);
		}

		function getParmVal(name){
			var url = document.URL.parseQuery();
			if(url[name]){
				return decodeURI(url[name]);
			}
			else{
				return;
			}
		}
	</script>
</j:jelly>
result.name: std_chg_glide_list_change_requests

<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
    <j:choose>
        <j:when test="${JSUtil.notNil(knowledgeRecord.sys_id)}">
            <iframe id="iframe_live_feed" src="$knowledge_feedback.do?sysparm_stack=no${AND}sysparm_kb_id=$[knowledgeRecord.sys_id]" width="100%" height="1" scrolling="no" aria-label="${gs.getMessage('Knowledge feedback frame')}"></iframe>
        </j:when>
        <j:otherwise>
            <iframe id="iframe_live_feed" src="" width="100%" height="1" scrolling="no" aria-label="${gs.getMessage('Knowledge feedback frame')}"></iframe>
        </j:otherwise>
    </j:choose>
    <script>
        CustomEvent.observe('content_frame.resized', resizeFrame);
        CustomEvent.observe('content_frame.loaded', resizeFrame);

        function resizeFrame(id, height){
            if (!id)
                return;
    
            var f = $(id);
            if (!f)
                return;
		
            if(height > 107)  
				f.height = height+16;
		    else
		        f.height = height;
		
			if(parent.document) {
				parent.CustomEvent.fire('content_frame.resized', window.name, parent.document.body.scrollHeight);			
			}
        };
    </script>
</j:jelly>

result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
  <script>
    var table = "${sysparm_table}";
    var id = "${sysparm_id}";
    var type = "${sysparm_type}";
    var choice = "${sysparm_choice}";
    var count = 0;

    var gcm = new GwtContextMenu('context_personalize_menu');
    gcm.setTableName('${ref}');
    gcm.clear();

    <g:evaluate var="jvar_personalize_dictionary" expression="gs.hasRole('personalize_dictionary')" />
    <g:evaluate var="jvar_personalize_styles" expression="gs.hasRole('personalize_styles')" />
    <g:evaluate var="jvar_personalize_security" expression="gs.hasRole('security_admin')" />
    <g:evaluate var="jvar_show_security" expression="gs.hasRightsTo('ui/configure.personalize_security/write', null)" />
    <g:evaluate var="jvar_personalize_responses" expression="gs.hasRole('personalize_responses')" />
    <g:evaluate var="jvar_personalize_choices" expression="gs.hasRole('personalize_choices')" />
    <g:evaluate var="jvar_field_parts" object="true" jelly="true">
        var fieldParts = jelly.sysparm_id.substring(jelly.sysparm_table.length + 1).split('.');
    </g:evaluate>
    <g:evaluate var="jvar_table_dot_do" jelly="true">
        var tableDo = 'sys_dictionary.do';
        // see if our parent is named 'var__m_...', 
        // in which case we are a variable and need to use the correct .do
        if (fieldParts.length > 1) {
            var parentName = fieldParts[fieldParts.length - 2];
            if (parentName.indexOf('var__m_') == 0) {
                var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
                gr.setDisplayFields(['sys_class_name']);
                gr.addQuery('name', parentName);
                gr.addQuery('element', fieldParts[fieldParts.length - 1]);
                gr.query();
                if (gr.next())
                    tableDo = gr.sys_class_name + ".do";
            }
        }
        tableDo;
    </g:evaluate>
    <g:evaluate var="jvar_field_name">
        fieldParts[fieldParts.length -1];
    </g:evaluate>
    <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_dictionary == true }">
        gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Configure Label')}", 
            "personalizeField('" + id + "', 'sys_documentation.do');");
        gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Configure Dictionary')}", 
            "personalizeField('" + id + "', '" + '${jvar_table_dot_do}' + "');");
        count = 1;
    </j:if>
    <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_styles == true }">
        gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Configure Styles')}",
            "showList('sys_ui_style', 'name.element', '" + id + "');");
        count = 1;
    </j:if>
    <j:if test="${sysparm_contextual_security == true}">
       <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_security == true}">
          gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Configure Security')}", 
              "personalizeSecurity('" + table + "', '" + id + "');");
          count = 1;
       </j:if>
       <j:if test="${jvar_show_security == true}">
          gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Show Security Rules')}",
              "listSecurity('" + table + "', '" + id + "');");
          count = 1;
       </j:if>
    </j:if>
    if ((choice != 0 ${AND} type != 'sys_class_name') || type == 'choice') {
        var disabled = needSubDisabled(table, id);
        if (count != 0)
            gcm.addLine();

        if (type.substring(0, 7) == 'journal') {
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_responses == true }">
                var c = gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Configure Responses')}",
                    "personalizeResponses('" + id + "');");

                if (disabled == true)
                    gcm._dullItem(c);

                count = 1;
            </j:if>
        } else {
            <g:evaluate var="jvar_personalize_choices_rights">
                var url = 'record/' + '${sysparm_table}' + '.' + '${jvar_field_name}' + '/personalize_choices';
                GlideSecurityManager.get().hasRightsTo(url, gs.getUser());
            </g:evaluate>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_choices == true || jvar_personalize_choices_rights == true }">
                var c = gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Configure Choices')}",
                    "personalizeChoices('" + id + "');");
                if (disabled == true)
                    gcm._dullItem(c);

                count = 1;
            </j:if>
            <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_choices == true }">
                gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Show Choice List')}",
                    "showList('sys_choice', 'name.element', '" + id + "');");
                count = 1;
            </j:if>
        }
    }
    <j:if test="${jvar_personalize_dictionary == true }" >
        gcm.addLine();
        gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Show')}" + " - '" + '${jvar_field_name}' + "'",
            "showDictionary('" + table + "', '" + id + "');");
        count = 1;
    </j:if>

    if(showWatchMenu(true) == true) {
        gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Watch')}" + " - '" + '${jvar_field_name}' + "'", "showWatchField('" + id + "');");
        count = 1;
    }

    if(showWatchMenu(false) == true) {
        gcm.addHref("${JS:gs.getMessage('Unwatch')}" + " - '" + '${jvar_field_name}' + "'", "clearWatchField('" + id + "');");
        count = 1;
    }

    if (count == 0)
        gcm = null;

    function needSubDisabled(table, id) {
        var dep = $('ni.dependent_reverse.' + id);
        if (dep ${AND} dep.value) {
            var p = dep.value;
            var d = table + "." + p;
            p = $(d);
            if (p ${AND} p.value == '')
                return true;
        }
    
        return false;
    }

    function isWatch() {
        if (type == 'password' || type == 'password2' || type == 'glide_encrypted')
            return false;
        var isOpticsPluginActive = ${pm.isActive('com.snc.optics_inspector')}; 
        //Debug icon will be displayed for admin or admin impersonated users
        var isAdmin = ${new GlideImpersonate().canImpersonate(gs.getUserID())};
        if (isOpticsPluginActive ${AND} isAdmin) {
            var el = $('label.' + id);
            if (el ${AND} !hasClassName(el, 'foreign'))
                return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    function showWatchMenu(showWatch) {
        var flag = false;

        if (!isWatch())
            return flag;

        // We're checking document location against top to see if the full real estate is available
        // or if we're isolated in a single page (Field Watcher panel not available).
        if (top.document.location.href == document.location.href)
            return flag;

        // The field watcher isn't supported in polaris
        if (typeof(isPolarisWrapper) === "function" ${AND} isPolarisWrapper())
            return flag;

        var isWatchActive = ('${sysparm_id}' === '${gs.getSession().getWatchField()}') ? true : false;
        if (showWatch ${AND} !isWatchActive)
            flag = true;
        else if (!showWatch ${AND} isWatchActive)
            flag = true;

        return flag;
    }

  </script>
</j:jelly>

result.description: Provides scale drop down select for diagrams.  Use the 'diagram' parameter to indicate the name of you diagram object.  Optionally, you may include an 'after' parameter to do something after the scaling is complete like scroll to a particular location within the diagram.
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
   <label for="scale_selector">$[SP]${gs.getMessage("Zoom")}:$[SP]</label>
   <select id="scale_selector" onchange="scaleDiagramPercent()">
      <option value="2.50">250%</option>
      <option value="2.00">200%</option>
      <option value="1.50">150%</option>
      <option value="1.25">125%</option>
      <option value="1.00" selected="true">100%</option>
      <option value="0.75">75%</option>
      <option value="0.50">50%</option>
   </select>
   <script>
      function scaleDiagramPercent() {
           var scale = 0;
           var selector = gel("scale_selector");
           for (var i=0; i ${AMP}lt; selector.options.length; i++) {
              var option = selector.options[i];
              if (option.selected) {
                 scale = option.value;
                 break;
              }
           }
           ${jvar_diagram}.scale(scale);
           ${jvar_after}
           ${jvar_diagram}.on("afterload", function() { 
              ${jvar_diagram}.currentScale = 1; 
              scaleDiagramPercent(); 
           });
      }

      function scalePercentReset() {
         selectMenuItem("1.00", "scale_selector");
      }
   </script>
</j:jelly>
