<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

	<j:set var="jvar_got_tiny" value="${pm.isRegistered('com.glide.editor.tinymce')}" />
	<j:set var="jvar_editor" value="${gs.getProperty('glide.ui.html.editor')}" />

	<g:evaluate var="jvar_tinymce_lang">
		// determine the user language
		// 		- first, try the user's language
		//		- second, the system's language
		//		- third, just use english

		// list of translations supported in /scripts/tiny_mce/langs
		var langsDefault = 'de,en,es,fr,it,ja,ko,nl,pt,ru,th,tr,zh,zt';
		var langs = gs.getProperty('glide.ui.html.editor.langauges', langsDefault);

		var userLanguage = gs.getUser().getLanguage();
		if (!userLanguage || langs.indexOf(userLanguage) == -1)
		userLanguage = gs.getProperty('glide.sys.language');

		if (!userLanguage || langs.indexOf(userLanguage) == -1)
		userLanguage = 'en'; // if we don't have the language, fall back to english

		userLanguage;
	</g:evaluate>

	<j:choose>
		 <j:when test="${jvar_editor=='tinymce' && jvar_got_tiny}">
			 <script>
				// variables for tinymce init
				var g_tinymce_lang = "${JS:jvar_tinymce_lang}";
				var g_tinymce_remove_script_host = ${gs.getProperty('glide.ui.html.editor.remove_host', 'true')};
				var tinymce_toolbar_line1 = "${JS:gs.getProperty('glide.ui.html.editor.v4.toolbar.line1')}";
				var tinymce_toolbar_line2 = "${JS:gs.getProperty('glide.ui.html.editor.v4.toolbar.line2')}";
				var tinymce_fonts = "${JS:gs.getProperty('glide.ui.html.editor.v4.font.collection','Arial=arial,helvetica,sans-serif;')}";

				addLoadEvent(function() {
					if (typeof g_sc_form == "undefined") if (typeof g_form != "undefined") {
						g_sc_form = g_form;
					}
				});
			 </script>
		 </j:when>
		 <j:otherwise>
			 <g:requires name="scripts/htmlareaIncludes.js" includes="true" />
			 <g:requires name="scripts/htmlarea/htmlarea.css" />
			 <script>
				 var _editor_url = "scripts/htmlarea/";

				 function initHTMLArea() {
					 var config = new HTMLArea.Config("${gs.getProperty('glide.ui.html.toolbar')}");
					 <j:set var="jvar_theme" value="$[gs.getPreference(new GlideThemeUtil().getThemeVersion())]"/>
					 config.headContent = '<link href="styles/css_includes.css?c=$[gs.getProperty('css.version')]_$[GlideCacheManager.getFlushStamp('csscsscsscache')]&theme=${jvar_theme}" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet"/>';
					 config.attachment_add_attachments = "false";
					 var ta = new HTMLArea('article', config);
					 ta.registerPlugin(SpellChecker);
					 ta.generate(null, null, "5");
					 ta.setTextDirection("${jvar_i18n_style}");
					 if (typeof g_sc_form != "undefined")
						 g_sc_form.registerHandler('article', ta);
					 else if (typeof g_form != "undefined") {
						 g_form.registerHandler('article', ta);
						 g_sc_form = g_form;
					 }
				 }

				 addLoadEvent(function() {
					 if (typeof HTMLArea != "undefined")
						 initHTMLArea();
					 else
						 CustomEvent.observe("htmlarea.loaded", initHTMLArea);
				 });
			 </script>
		 </j:otherwise>
	</j:choose>

</j:jelly>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="true" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide">
	<!-- This should only be executed in phase 2 and the output should not be cached -->
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_path" jelly="true">
		var path = ['/polarisberg_theme_variables.do?c=' + encodeURIComponent(sn_ui.PolarisUI.getThemeVariableCssCacheKey())];
		if (jelly.jvar_exclude_dark === true || jelly.jvar_exclude_dark === 'true' || jelly.sysparm_exclude_dark === 'true')
			path.push('exclude_dark=true');
		
		// set in polarisberg_output.xml
		if (JSUtil.notNil(jelly.jvar_theme_id))
			path.push('theme_id=' + jelly.jvar_theme_id);

		// set in polarisberg_output.xml
		if (JSUtil.notNil(jelly.jvar_theme_variant_id))
			path.push('theme_variant_id=' + jelly.jvar_theme_variant_id);
		
		path.join('&');
	</g:evaluate>
	<j:choose>
		<j:when test="${sysparm_path_only}">
			${jvar_path}

    <select name="sysparm_application" id="sysparm_application">
        <option value="">${gs.getMessage('-- The New One --')}</option>
        <g2:evaluate var="jvar_item" expression="
         var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_app_application');

         gr.orderBy('device_type');

                    deviceType = '(' + dt + ')';
                deviceType;" />
            <option value="$[gr.sys_id]">$[gr.title]$[SP]$[SP]$[jvar_device_type]</option>
        </j2:while>
    </select>
</j:jelly>

result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

<input type="hidden" name="authenticated" id="authenticated" />
<input type="hidden" name="_canSubmit" id="_canSubmit" />
<input type="hidden" name="minScheduled" id="minScheduled" />
<input type="hidden" name="minimumCloneStartTime" id="minimumCloneStartTime"/>	
<input type="hidden" name="cloneRecordSysId" id="cloneRecordSysId" />	

<script>


var _authenticateCallback = null; // caller shows confirmation dialog before submission
var _isCloneEstimationMessagePopulated = false;

addLoadEvent(function() {
  // min scheduled date gets the default advanced notice
  $("minScheduled").value = g_form.getValue("scheduled");
});

function isTargetAuthenticated() {
  return $('authenticated').value == '1';
}

function invalidateTarget() {
  $('authenticated').value = ''; 
}

function setSubmit() {
	$('_canSubmit').value = 'true';
}

function canSubmit(){
	return $('_canSubmit').value == 'true';
}

function onTargetChanged() {
  invalidateTarget();
  var targetSysId = g_form.getValue("target_instance");
  var profile = g_form.getValue("profile");
  if (targetSysId == null || targetSysId.length == 0)
    return;

  var schedule_date = g_form.getValue("scheduled");
  
   var o = new GlideDialogWindow('clone_wait');
   o.setTitle(getMessage("Processing.."));
   o.setPreference('sysparm_info', getMessage("Please wait while we get the start time for your clone"));
   o.render();
  
  var ga = new GlideAjax('InstanceCloneManagerAjax');
  ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getMinDate');
  ga.addParam('sysparm_instance_id', targetSysId);
  ga.addParam('sysparm_schedule_date', schedule_date);
  ga.addParam('sysparm_profile', profile);
  ga.getXML(onTargetChangedResponse);

  window.setTimeout(function(){
	o.destroy();
	},3000);
  
}

function onTargetChangedResponse(response) {
    if (response != null)
	 _setProposedCloneParams(response);
}

function authenticateTarget(callback) {
  _authenticateCallback = callback;

  var targetSysId = g_form.getValue("target_instance");
  if (targetSysId == null || targetSysId.length == 0)
    return;

  var instance = g_form.getReference("target_instance", _authenticateTargetResponse);
}

function _authenticateTargetResponse(instance) {
   if (!instance || instance == null)
     return;

   var sysId = gel('sys_uniqueValue').value;
   var schedule_date = g_form.getValue("scheduled");   
	
   // bring up the auth dialog which does the connectivity tests
   var o = new GlideDialogWindow('clone_target_authenticate');   
   o.setTitle('Authenticate Target - ' + instance.instance_name);
   o.setPreference('instance_sysid', instance.sys_id);
   o.setPreference('schedule_date', schedule_date);	
   o.setPreference('instance_id', instance.instance_id);
   o.setPreference('instance_url', instance.instance_url);
   o.setPreference('clone_id', sysId);
   o.setPreference('admin_user', g_user.userName);
   o.setPreference('onLoginSuccess', _authenticateSuccess);
   o.render();
}

function _authenticateSuccess(scheduled, clusterNode, securityToken) {
  $("authenticated").value = "1";
  _setAdvanceNotice(scheduled);

  if (clusterNode)
    g_form.setValue("cluster_node", clusterNode);

  if (securityToken)
    g_form.setValue("security_token", securityToken);

  if (_authenticateCallback != null)
    _authenticateCallback();
}

function getAdvanceNoticeDate() {
  return $("minimumCloneStartTime").value;	
}

function isAdvanceNotice() {
  var userDate = g_form.getValue("scheduled");
  var minDate = getAdvanceNoticeDate();
  if (userDate == "" || minDate == "")
    return true;
	

  if (userDate == minDate)
    return true;
  
  // get user's date time display format
  var format = g_user_date_time_format;

  // 1 (true) if minDate is greater than userDate
  // 0 if userDate is greater than minDate of if they are the same
  // -1 if either of the dates is in an invalid format 

  // so advance notice is OK if minDate is not greater than userDate
  var answer = compareDates(minDate, format, userDate, format);
  return answer != 1;
}

function _setAdvanceNotice(minDate) {
  if (minDate == null || minDate.length == 0)
    return;

  $("minScheduled").value = minDate;
  // only change the user-defined schedule date if it is BEFORE min allowed server date
  if (isAdvanceNotice()) {
	 return;
	}

  g_form.setValue("scheduled", minDate);  
}

function _setProposedCloneParams(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer")||'';
	// answer is the DOM element to parse always for Glide Ajax call
	answer = answer.evalJSON();//Decode Response as JSON Object
	if(answer.maxRecurringCloneDuration != '') 
		g_scratchpad.maxCloneDuration = answer.maxRecurringCloneDuration;

	var proposedCloneStartTime = answer.scheduledStartTime ||'';
	if (proposedCloneStartTime == null || proposedCloneStartTime.length == 0) 
		return;

	var cloneEstimationMessage = getMessage(answer.cloneEstimationMessage || '');
	_isCloneEstimationMessagePopulated = true; 
	g_form.setValue("scheduled", proposedCloneStartTime);
	_isCloneEstimationMessagePopulated = false;
	$("minScheduled").value = proposedCloneStartTime;
	$("cloneRecordSysId").value = answer.cloneRecordSysId || '';
	g_form.showFieldMsg('scheduled',cloneEstimationMessage ,'info');
	$("minimumCloneStartTime").value = answer.minimumCloneStartTime;
}

function showErrorDialog(error) { 
	var o = new GlideOverlay({
		title: "ERROR"
	});

	o.setPreference('sysparm_error', error);
	o.setBodyFromForm('clone_error');
	o.render();
}

function onScheduleChange(newCloneStartDate) {
	invalidateTarget();
	var targetSysId = g_form.getValue("target_instance");
	if (targetSysId == null || targetSysId.length == 0)
	return;

	var minScheduleDate = $("minScheduled").value;
	// Make sure we don't call this for the first time
	if (minScheduleDate.length == 0 || minScheduleDate == null || _isCloneEstimationMessagePopulated) {
	return;
	}
	//Show a progress message
	g_form.showFieldMsg('scheduled',getMessage('Checking availability for the new start time ...') ,'info');
	var clone_record_sys_id = $("cloneRecordSysId").value;
	var ga = new GlideAjax('InstanceCloneManagerAjax');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'isReservationAvailable');
	ga.addParam('sysparam_clone_record_sys_id', clone_record_sys_id);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_clone_start_date', newCloneStartDate);
	ga.getXML(processOnScheduleDate);
	}

	function processOnScheduleDate(response){
	// Hide the Progress message
	g_form.hideFieldMsg('scheduled');
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer")||'';
	answer = answer.evalJSON();//Decode Response as JSON Object
	var is_reservation_available = answer.isReservationAvailable || '';
	var clone_estimation_msg = getMessage(answer.cloneEstimationMessage || '');
	if (is_reservation_available == "1") {
		var proposedCloneStartTime = answer.scheduledStartTime ||'';
		$("minScheduled").value = proposedCloneStartTime;
		g_form.showFieldMsg('scheduled',clone_estimation_msg ,'info');
	}  else {
		g_form.showFieldMsg('scheduled',clone_estimation_msg ,'error');
	}
}

function showLargePreserverWarning(largePreserverOptions,cloneSysID){
	var options = {};
	var _dialog = new GlideDialogWindow('clone_large_preserver_warning_popup');
	_dialog.setTitle('');
	_dialog.setPreference('options',largePreserverOptions);
	_dialog.setPreference('sys_id',cloneSysID);
	_dialog.render();
}

</script>
</j:jelly>

result.description: Fetch embedded queries for the associated source task in a new knowledge form
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_testEmbeddedQueries">
		var shouldCheckEmbeddedQueries = current.isNewRecord() ${AND} !gs.nil(current.getValue('source'));
		shouldCheckEmbeddedQueries;
	</g2:evaluate>
	
	<j2:if test='$[jvar_testEmbeddedQueries]'>
		<g2:evaluate var="jvar_embeddedQueries">
			var queries = new global.KMRecordPageUtils().getEmbeddedQueries(current.getValue('source'));
			JSON.stringify(queries);
		</g2:evaluate>
		<g2:evaluate var="jvar_urlQueries">
			var queries = gs.action.getGlideURI().toString();
			queries;
		</g2:evaluate>
		<script>
			function applyQueries() {
				try {
					var embeddedQueries = JSON.parse('$[jvar_embeddedQueries]');
					var urlQueries = '$[jvar_urlQueries]';

					for (var field in embeddedQueries) {
						var fieldKey1 = '%5e' + field + '%3d';
						var fieldKey2 = '=' + field + '%3d';
						if (urlQueries.indexOf(fieldKey1) > -1 || urlQueries.indexOf(fieldKey2) > -1)
							continue;
						g_form.setValue(field, embeddedQueries[field]);
					}
				} catch (error) {
					console.error('Failed to apply embedded queries' + error);
				}
			};

			jQuery(window).load(function(){
				addAfterPageLoadedEvent(function() { applyQueries(); });
			});
		</script>
	</j2:if>
</j:jelly>
result.name: knowledge_form_embedded_queries

result.description: Renders the template value field in the 'Standard Change Template'.
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<j:set var="jvar_element_label" value="${gs.getMessage('Change Request values')}"/>
	<j:set var="jvar_templ_on_table" value="change_request"/>
	<j:set var="jvar_template_value_readonly" value="true"/>

	<g:macro_invoke macro="snc_itsma_custom_form_field_doctype" element_id="template_value_ui_formatter" element_label="${jvar_element_label}">
		<g:macro_invoke macro="std_chg_template_handler"/>
	</g:macro_invoke>
	<g:macro_invoke macro="snc_itsma_custom_form_field_nondoctype" element_id="template_value_ui_formatter" element_label="${jvar_element_label}">
		<g:macro_invoke macro="std_chg_template_handler"/>
	</g:macro_invoke>

	<script>
		addRenderEvent(function() {
			// Tried setting a variable in the jelly script to 'template value'
			// but, we are seeing that the value is cached and when user navigates to a different record 
			// the same old value being displayed. Hence making a glide ajax call
			var ga = new GlideAjax('StdChangeUtils');
			ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getTemplateValue');
			ga.addParam('sysparm_sysid', g_form.getUniqueValue());
			ga.addParam('sysparm_tableName', g_form.getTableName());
			ga.getXMLAnswer(function(answer) {
				processFields(answer);
				var field = gel('sys_template.templatefilters_table');
				if(field){
					field.align = "center";
					field.width = "100%";
				}

				// We are seeing a horizontal scroll bar rendered by the GlideFilter
				// hence hiding the same in the readonly mode
				var uiFormatter = gel('template_value_ui_formatter');
				if(uiFormatter)
					uiFormatter.parentElement.style.overflowX = "hidden";
			});
		});
	</script>
</j:jelly>
result.name: std_change_readonly_template_handler

result.description: This makes multiselect inputs usable on an ipad.
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<script type="text/javascript">
		if(navigator.userAgent.match(/iPad/i)) {
			var fixIpadMultiselect = function() {
				$j('select[multiple]').iosmultiselect();
			}
			addLoadEvent(function() {
				if($j $[AND] $j.fn) {
					if($j.fn.iosmultiselect){
						fixIpadMultiselect();
					} else {
						var scriptId = "iosMultiselectPlugin";
						var scriptTag = document.getElementById(scriptId);
						if (!scriptTag) {
							var ref = document.getElementsByTagName( "script" )[ 0 ];
							var script = document.createElement( "script" );
							script.id = scriptId;
							script.async = true;
							ref.parentNode.insertBefore( script, ref );
							script.onload = fixIpadMultiselect;
							script.src = 'scripts/lib/jquery.iosmultiselect.js';
						}
					}
						
				}
			});
		}
	</script>
</j:jelly>
result.name: ipad_multiselect

result.description:
Don't Save, Cancel, and Save... buttons for a dialog.  Default actions are actionSave() and close (destroy) the dialog

discard - you need to supply in the page's client script section
discard_id - ID for the Save... button.  Defaults to "save_button" if not specified.
save - you need to supply in the page's client script section
save_id - ID for the Save... button.  Defaults to "save_button" if not specified.
save_type - Defaults to "submit" but can be "button" if the button should not submit.
cancel_id - ID for the Cancel button.  Defaults to "cancel_button" if not specified.
cancel_type - Defaults to "submit" but can be "button" if the button should not submit.

result.description:
Total column in Itemised cart summary table, without a recurring frequency.

This macro shows how the columns can be customised to display or hide the price and recurring prices, for more information see the wiki article:
http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Configuring_Cart_Layouts_Creating_Macros_For_Cart_Layouts
result.xml:

    </j:if>
</j:jelly>

result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_target_parents" jelly="true">
		var tables = [];
		if (jelly.sysparm_target) {
			var table = (jelly.sysparm_target + "").split(".");

			if (table.length > 1) {
				var tblList = GlideDBObjectManager.getTables(table[0]);

				for (var i = 0, l = tblList.size(); l > i; i++) {
					tables.push(tblList.get(i));
				}
			}
		}
		var wf_target_parents = tables.join(" ");
		wf_target_parents;
	</g2:evaluate>

	<script>
		var g_target_parents = "$[jvar_target_parents]".split(" ");
	</script>
</j:jelly>
result.name: wf_target_parents

<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:evaluate jelly="true" >
	var req_parent_id = jelly.RP.getParameterValue('sysparm_parent_sys_id');
	var req_table_name = jelly.RP.getParameterValue('sysparm_parent_table');
	if(JSUtil.notNil(req_parent_id) && JSUtil.notNil(req_table_name)) {
		var recGR = new GlideRecord(req_table_name);
		var recFound;
		if(recGR.isValid())
			recFound = recGR.get(req_parent_id);
		else
			gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Invalid table in URL parameter'));
		if(recFound) {
			var tableLabel =  recGR.getLabel();
			var recDisplayVal =  recGR.getDisplayValue();
			var displayLink = "<a href ='/" + req_table_name + ".do?sys_id=" + req_parent_id + "'>" + recDisplayVal + "</a>"
			var notificationMsg = gs.getMessage("To View {0}, Click {1}", [tableLabel, displayLink]);
			gs.addInfoMessage(notificationMsg);
		}
	}
</g:evaluate>
</j:jelly>

result.description:
Creates a multi-value reference showing records from a specified table. Uses sys_id as the default unique identifier.

Attributes: 
label= the field label
name= what you want to name the select
table= the table from which you will select
display_value= the field name to use as the display value
value= the initial values, comma separated sys_ids (optional)
order_by= the field to sort reference results by (optional)
query= the base query or reference qualifier (optional)
onchange= the client function to call on value change. eg: "onMultiReferenceChange(e)" (optional)
onradiochange=the client function to call when the selected radio button has changed (optional)
placeholder= the placeholder text to show when there is no value (optional)
hide=show the radio button and label only

result.description: This UI Macro is to be updated as per any customizations done in the login widget
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:g2="null" xmlns:j2="null">

    <g2:evaluate var="jvar_default_idp" jelly="true">
        var default_idp = gs.getProperty('glide.authenticate.sso.redirect.idp', '');

        var customURL = gs.getBoolean('glide.customurl.enabled', false);
        var multisso_enabled = gs.getBoolean("glide.authenticate.multisso.enabled", false);
        if (customURL == true && data.multisso_enabled == true) {
            var idp = SNC.CustomURLSPUtil.getAutoRedirectIDPForCustomURLWithPortal();
            if(GlideStringUtil.notNil(idp))
                default_idp = idp;
        }

        default_idp;
    </g2:evaluate>

    <j2:if test="$[jvar_default_idp != '']">
        <g2:evaluate>
            var gs_nav_to = session.getProperty("nav_to");
            var pageURI = new GlideSPUtil().getPageUri();
            session.putProperty("nav_to", null);
            if (pageURI) {
                session.putProperty("is_direct_redirect", "true");
                session.putProperty("starting_page", pageURI);
            }
            else if (!session.getProperty("starting_page") $[AND] gs_nav_to)
                session.putProperty("starting_page", gs_nav_to);
        </g2:evaluate>

        <html>
            <head>
                <script>
                    var hashValue = window.location.hash.substring(1);
                    if (hashValue)
                        window.sessionStorage.setItem('sn.sp.url_before_SSO', window.location.href);
                        window.location = "/login_with_sso.do?glide_sso_id=$[jvar_default_idp]";
                </script>
            </head>
            <body></body>
        </html>
    </j2:if>
</j:jelly>

result.description:
show user incidents popup link
			activate by:
			- set the active field in this macro to true
			- adding the attribute to a dictionary field:
			ref_contributions=user_show_incidents
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:evaluate var="jvar_guid" expression="gs.generateGUID(this);" />
<j:set var="jvar_n" value="show_incidents_${jvar_guid}:${ref}"/>
<g:reference_decoration id="${jvar_n}" field="${ref}" 
  onclick="showRelatedList('${ref}'); "
  title="${gs.getMessage('Show related incidents')}" image="images/icons/tasks.gifx" icon="icon-tree-right"/>

<script>
// show related list 
// todo: should be part of the PopupWindow class
// todo: needs new stack name
function showRelatedList(reference) {
	var s = reference.split('.');
	// Get the field name which is always last
  	var referenceField = s[s.length - 1];
  	var v = g_form.getValue(reference);
  	var w = new GlideDialogWindow('show_list');
  	w.setTitle('Related incidents');
  	w.setPreference('table', 'incident_list');
  	w.setPreference('sysparm_view', 'default');
  	w.setPreference('sysparm_query', referenceField + '=' + v);
  	w.render();
}

</script>
</j:jelly>
result.name: user_show_incidents

result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

    <script>
	(function() {
		var refreshIntervalId;
        window.groupPreferenceOnLoad = function(iframe) {
            if (iframe.contentWindow.location.href.indexOf('on_call_group_preference.do') != -1) {
                var iframeDocument = iframe.contentWindow.document;
				var height = iframeDocument.body.scrollHeight;
                iframe.style.height = height + 'px';
                var editCSS = iframeDocument.createElement('style');
                editCSS.innerHTML = ".section_header_content_no_scroll {overflow: hidden;} #page_timing_div, .form_action_button_container{display: none}";
                iframeDocument.body.appendChild(editCSS);
				var $groupIcon = iframeDocument.getElementById('on_call_group_preference.rota_managers_edit').querySelector('.icon-user-group');
				if($groupIcon)
					$groupIcon.parentElement.remove();
				refreshIntervalId = setInterval(function() {
	  				var $glidePopup = iframeDocument.querySelector('.glide-popup');
	  				if($glidePopup && iframe.style.height == height + 'px')
	  					iframe.style.height = (height + $glidePopup.scrollHeight) + 'px';
	  				else if(!$glidePopup && iframe.style.height != height + 'px')
	  					iframe.style.height = height + 'px';
	  			}, 600);
				iframe.contentWindow.g_form.setValue('group', window.g_form.getValue('group'));
				// Set the modified values, if caming back from next or previous tabs.
				if(window.g_form.getValue('group_preferences_modified') == 'true') {
					iframe.contentWindow.g_form.setValue('rota_managers',  window.g_form.getValue('rota_managers'));
					iframe.contentWindow.g_form.setValue('pto_approval_config',  window.g_form.getValue('pto_approval_config'));
					iframe.contentWindow.g_form.setValue('allow_rota_overlap',  window.g_form.getValue('allow_rota_overlap'));
					iframe.contentWindow.g_form.setValue('escalation_rule_rota_overlap',  window.g_form.getValue('escalation_rule_rota_overlap'));
				}
            } else
	  			clearInterval(refreshIntervalId);
        };
	})();
    </script>

    <style>
        #on-call-group-preference {
            min-height: 375px;
        }
    </style>

    <iframe id="on-call-group-preference" frameBorder="0" width="100%" scrolling="no" onload="groupPreferenceOnLoad(this);"></iframe>


</j:jelly>

result.description: Add template context menu items
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<j:set var="jvar_show_template_bar_property_name" value="glide.ui.show_template_bar.${ref}"/>
	<g:evaluate jelly="true" var="jvar_show_template_bar" expression="gs.getProperty(jelly.jvar_show_template_bar_property_name, 'true')"/>

	<j2:if test="$[gs.getProperty('glide.ui.doctype') != 'true' || gs.getSession().getProperty('device_type') != 'doctype' ]">
		<j2:if test="$[!RP.isPrint()]">
			<j2:if test="$[empty(jvar_templates)]">
				<g2:evaluate var="jvar_templates" jelly="true" object="true">
					var tu = new TemplateUtil();
					var gr = tu.getApplicable(${ref}.getTableName());
					gr.getRowCount();
				</g2:evaluate>
			</j2:if>

			<script>
				var mTemplate = new GwtContextMenu('context_templatesub${jvar_section_id}');
				mTemplate.clear();
				var mApplyTemplates = new GwtContextMenu('context_applytemplatesub${jvar_section_id}');
				mApplyTemplates.clear();
			</script>
			<input type="hidden" name="selected_template" id="selected_template" onchange="applyTemplate(this.value)"/>
			<input type="hidden" name="sys_display.selected_template" id="sys_display.selected_template"/>
			<j2:if test="$[jvar_templates > 0 ]">
				<g2:evaluate var="jvar_show_list" jelly="true">
					jelly.jvar_templates > parseInt(gs.getProperty('glide.template.max_context', '15'));
				</g2:evaluate>

				<j2:if test="$[jvar_show_list]">
					<script>
						mTemplate.addHref("${gs.getMessage('Apply Template')}", "openTemplateSelector()");

						function openTemplateSelector() {
							reflistOpen('selected_template', 'not', 'sys_template', null, null, null, "sys_idINjavascript:getApplicableTemplates('$[${ref}.getTableName()]')");
						}
					</script>
				</j2:if>

				<j2:if test="$[!jvar_show_list]">
					<j2:if test="$[empty(jvar_templates_gr)]">
						<g2:evaluate var="jvar_templates_gr" jelly="true" object="true">
							if (templates_list == null) {
								var templates_list = new GlideChoiceList();
								var tt = GetTemplatesList.getGlideRecord(${ref}.getTableName());
								while (tt.nextRecord())
									templates_list.add(tt.getValue('sys_id'), tt.getValue('name'));
							}
							templates_list;
						</g2:evaluate>
					</j2:if>
					<j2:if test="$[!jvar_templates_gr.isEmpty()]">
						<j2:forEach items="$[jvar_templates_gr]" var="jvar_template">
							<script>
								mApplyTemplates.addHref("$[jvar_template.getLabel()]", "applyTemplate('$[jvar_template.getValue()]')");
							</script>
						</j2:forEach>
						<script>
							mTemplate.addMenu("${gs.getMessage('Apply Template')}", mApplyTemplates);
						</script>
					</j2:if>
				</j2:if>
			</j2:if>
			<j2:if test="$[${ref}.isNewRecord() == false]">
				<j2:if test="$[jvar_session.hasRole('template_editor')]">
					<input type="hidden" name="sysverb_save_as_template" id="sysverb_save_as_template"/>
					<script>
						mTemplate.addHref("${gs.getMessage('Save as Template')}", "TemplateRecord.save(document.getElementById('sysverb_save_as_template'))");
					</script>
					<j2:if test="$[jvar_session.hasRole('admin')]">
						<input type="hidden" name="sysverb_save_all_as_template" id="sysverb_save_all_as_template"/>
						<script>
							mTemplate.addHref("${gs.getMessage('Save All as Template')}", "TemplateRecord.save(document.getElementById('sysverb_save_all_as_template'))");
						</script>
					</j2:if>
				</j2:if>
			</j2:if>
			<g2:evaluate var="jvar_personalize_templates" expression="gs.hasRole('template_editor,template_editor_group,template_editor_global')"/>
			<j2:if test="$[jvar_personalize_templates == true ]">
				<script>
					mTemplate.addHref("${gs.getMessage('Edit Templates')}", "showList('sys_template', 'table.active', '${ref}.true');");
				</script>
			</j2:if>
			<j2:if test="$[jvar_personalize_templates == true || jvar_templates > 0 ]">
				<script>gcm.addMenu("${gs.getMessage('Templates')}", mTemplate);</script>

			</j2:if>
		</j2:if>
	</j2:if>
	<j2:if test="$[gs.getProperty('glide.ui.doctype') == 'true' && gs.getSession().getProperty('device_type') == 'doctype' && gs.getUser().getPreference('use.concourse') != 'true']">
		<script>
			<j:if test="${jvar_show_template_bar == 'true'}">
				gcm.addHref("${gs.getMessage('Show/Hide Template Bar')}", "CustomEvent.fire('templateToggle')");
			</j:if>
		</script>
	</j2:if>
</j:jelly>
result.name: template_context

result.description: Add label form context menu items
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<j:if test="${jvar_show_tags_context_menu}">
     <script>
	var mLabels = new GwtContextMenu('context_labelsub${jvar_section_id}');
	mLabels.clear();

        <j2:if test="$[jvar_labels == null]" >
	   <g2:evaluate object="true" var="jvar_labels">
	       GlideLabelUtil.getRecentDisplayLabelsForUser(9);
	   </g2:evaluate>
           <g2:evaluate jelly="true" var="jvar_show_more_option">
               var showMore = false;
               if (jelly.jvar_labels.size() == 9) {
                  jelly.jvar_labels.remove(8)
                  showMore = true;
               }
               showMore;
       </g2:evaluate>
        </j2:if>

	mLabels.addHref("${gs.getMessage('New Tag...')}", "newLabel('${ref}', '$[${ref}.sys_id]')");

	<j2:forEach var="jvar_label" items="$[jvar_labels]">
           <g2:evaluate object="true" var="jvar_label" jelly="true">
	      GlideStringUtil.escapeHTML('$[jvar_label]');
	   </g2:evaluate>
	   mLabels.addHref("$[jvar_label]", "doAssignLabel('${ref}','$[jvar_label]', '$[${ref}.sys_id]')");
	</j2:forEach>

    <j2:if test="$[jvar_show_more_option]">
	    mLabels.addHref("${gs.getMessage('More...')}", "assignLabelViaLookup('${ref}', '$[${ref}.sys_id]')");
    </j2:if>

        gcm.addMenu("${gs.getMessage('Assign Tag')}", mLabels);

        <j2:if test="$[jvar_labels_assigned == null]" >
	   <g2:evaluate object="true" jelly="true" var="jvar_labels_assigned">
	      GlideLabelUtil.getDisplayLabelsForRecord(jelly.jvar_labels, __ref_string__, __ref__.sys_id);
	   </g2:evaluate>
	   <g2:evaluate jelly="true" var="jvar_more_labels_assigned">
	       var moreLabels = false;
	       if (jelly.jvar_labels_assigned.size() > 30)
	           moreLabels = true;
	       moreLabels;
	   </g2:evaluate>
        </j2:if>

	<j2:if test="$[jvar_labels_assigned.size() > 0]">
		mLabels = new GwtContextMenu('context_labelremove${jvar_section_id}');
		mLabels.clear();
		<j2:forEach var="jvar_label" items="$[jvar_labels_assigned]" begin="0" end="29">
                        <g2:evaluate object="true" var="jvar_label" jelly="true">
	                    GlideStringUtil.escapeHTML('$[jvar_label]');
	                </g2:evaluate>
			mLabels.addHref("$[jvar_label]", "doRemoveLabel('${ref}', '$[jvar_label]', '$[${ref}.sys_id]')");
		</j2:forEach>
		<j2:if test="$[jvar_more_labels_assigned]">
		    mLabels.addHref("${gs.getMessage('More...')}", "removeLabelViaLookup('${ref}', '$[${ref}.sys_id]')");
		</j2:if>
		gcm.addMenu("${gs.getMessage('Remove Tag')}", mLabels);
	</j2:if>
     </script>
</j:if>
</j:jelly>

result.description: Displays the dialog window to track the progress of a conflict detection job. Scripts used are located in the UI Script - ChangeRequestConflictUtils
result.xml:
// Build up labels and messages var conflictMode = gs.getProperty("change.conflict.mode"); var conflictRoles = gs.getProperty("change.conflict.role", "itil,sn_change_write"); var currentSysId = current.getUniqueValue(); var backgroundTracker = gs.getSession().getClientData('tracker_' + currentSysId); //check if the flag to run Conflict Detection has been set and clear it //so conflict detection does not get run on form refresh var runTrackerUI = gs.getSession().getClientData('run_conflict_ui'); if (runTrackerUI == 'true') gs.getSession().clearClientData('run_conflict_ui'); var screenReaderWarnMessage = gs.getMessage("Warning Message"); var warningMessage = ""; if (conflictMode == 'basic') warningMessage = gs.getMessage("Configuration item, Planned start date and Planned end date are required to run conflict detection"); else warningMessage = gs.getMessage("Configuration item/Affected CIs, Planned start date and Planned end date are required to run conflict detection"); var buttonState = "ready"; var affectedItemCount = 0; if (currentSysId) { // Find out how many affected items are associated with this change request var taskCiGr = new GlideAggregate('task_ci'); taskCiGr.addQuery('task', currentSysId); taskCiGr.addAggregate('COUNT'); taskCiGr.query(); if (taskCiGr.next()) affectedItemCount = parseInt(taskCiGr.getAggregate('COUNT'), 10); } var trackerSysId = ""; //If Conflict detection has been triggered by BR 'Update Conflicts' then set the trackerId if (backgroundTracker != '') { trackerSysId = backgroundTracker; gs.getSession().clearClientData('tracker_' + currentSysId); } if (currentSysId) { // Find the id of any existing trackers running for this change var trackerGr = new GlideRecord("sys_execution_tracker"); trackerGr.addQuery("source", currentSysId); trackerGr.addQuery("name", ChangeCheckConflicts.TRACKER_NAME); trackerGr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on'); trackerGr.query(); if (trackerGr.next()){ var trackerState = trackerGr.state - 0; if (trackerState == 0 || trackerState == 1) trackerSysId = trackerGr.getUniqueValue(); } }
$[screenReaderWarnMessage] $[warningMessage]

    <j:set var="jvar_list" value="${jvar_history.split(',')}" />
    <j:set var="jvar_current_user" value="${user.getID()}" />
    <!-- if we're impersonating right now then our "root" user always shows up -->
    <j:if test="${gs.getImpersonatingUserName() != null}">
        <option value="${gs.getImpersonatingUserName()}" style="color:green">${gs.getImpersonatingUserDisplayName()}</option>
    </j:if>
    <j:if test="${gs.getImpersonatingUserName() == null}">
        <option value="${gs.getUser().getID()}" style="color:green">${gs.getUser().getFullName()}</option>
    </j:if>
    <j:forEach var="jvar_current_item" items="${jvar_list}">
        <j:if test="${jvar_current_item != jvar_current_user}">
            <g:evaluate jelly="true">
                var recent_user = GlideUser.getUser(jelly.jvar_current_item);
				if (recent_user != null)
                	var recent_name = GlideStringUtil.escapeHTML(recent_user.getFullName());
            </g:evaluate>
			<j:if test="${recent_user != null}">
				<option value="${recent_user.getID()}">${recent_name} </option>
	  		</j:if>
        </j:if>
    </j:forEach>
</j:jelly>

result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_show_modal">
	var showModal = false;
	if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('sn_km_gen_ai')){
		showModal = new sn_km_gen_ai.KMNowAssistInProductUtils().shouldShowGenAIGenerate(current.isNewRecord(),'task',current.getValue('source'),current.sys_class_name);
	}
	showModal;
	</g2:evaluate>
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_timeout">
	var timeout = 20000;
	if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('sn_km_gen_ai')){
		timeout = new sn_km_gen_ai.KMNowAssistInProductUtils().getClientSideTimeout();
	}
	timeout;
	</g2:evaluate>
	<j2:if test='$[jvar_show_modal]'>
		<script>
			jQuery(window).load(function(){
				addAfterPageLoadedEvent(function() { showGenAIDialog(); });
			});

			function showGenAIDialog(){
				var dialog = new GlideModal('knowledge_confirm_genAI_modal');
				dialog.setPreference('focusTrap', true);
				dialog.setPreference('sysparm_genai_client_timeout', '$[jvar_timeout]');
				dialog.setWidth(619);
				dialog.render();
			}
		</script>
	</j2:if>
</j:jelly>

 <j2:if test="$[current.canRead()]">
	 <style>
		 <!-- PRB1312522: This is to account for a bug in how the record being approved is in-lined into the approval form -->
		 span.icon.icon-info {
			margin-left: 0em !important;
		}
	 </style>
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_exists" jelly="true">
		var exists = false;
		var tname = null;
		var macro = null;
		if(!$[ref].source_table.nil())
			tname = 'approval_summarizer_' + $[ref].source_table;
		else if ($[ref].sysapproval != null )
			tname = 'approval_summarizer_' + $[ref].sysapproval.sys_class_name;

		macro = (tname != null) ? GlideDBMacro.get(tname) : macro;
		exists = (macro != null)? macro.exists() : exists;
		exists;
	</g2:evaluate>
	<j2:switch on="$[jvar_exists]">
		<j2:case value="true">
			<g2:macro_invoke macro="$[tname]" />
		</j2:case>
		<j2:default>
			<g2:macro_invoke macro="approval_summarizer_default" />
		</j2:default>
	</j2:switch>
  </j2:if>
</j:jelly>
result.name: approval_summarizer

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:evaluate var="jvar_login_origin">
	var sysparm_request_id = gs.getSession().getProperty('sysparm_request_id');
	var processId = new SNC.PwdTrackingManager().getProcessIdByRequestId(sysparm_request_id);
	var storedLoginURL = gs.getSession().getProperty('login_locate_sso.login_url');
	var loginURL = GlideStringUtil.notNil(storedLoginURL) ? storedLoginURL : '/navpage.do';
	var proc = new GlideRecord('pwd_process');
	proc.addQuery('sys_id', processId);
	proc.query();
	if(proc.next()){
		if(GlideStringUtil.notNil(proc.redirect_url))
			loginURL = proc.redirect_url;
	}
	
	var redirect_url = gs.getSession().getProperty('pwd_reset_done_redirect');
	if(redirect_url) {
		loginURL = redirect_url;
		gs.getSession().clearProperty('pwd_reset_done_redirect');
	}
	
	loginURL;
</g:evaluate>
<g:evaluate var="jvar_button_style" jelly="true">
	var buttonStyle = (jelly.jvar_display == 'false') ? 'display: none;' : '';
	buttonStyle;
</g:evaluate>
<button name="sysverb_pwd_done" id="sysverb_pwd_done" onclick="window.top.location.href='${jvar_login_origin}'"
		class="btn btn-primary btn-pwd-submit default-focus-online" style="${jvar_button_style}">${gs.getMessage("Done")}</button>
</j:jelly>
result.name: $pwd_done_button

result.description:
Radio button entry for UI Pages.  

id = the id to use for this entry.  If omitted this will be 'name' followed by the underscore character followed by 'value'
name = the name to use (this must be common among all the other radio buttons in the group so that when one is selected any other is deselected)
value = the value to use for this entry
text = the text to show for this entry
checked_value = the value to be automatically selected for the radio buttons in this group
onchange = javascript to be performed when this entry is selected
result.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
    <g:macro id="${jvar_name}_${jvar_value}" name="" value="" text="" checked_value="" onchange="" />
    <j:if test="${jvar_value == jvar_checked_value}">
       <label>
          <input type="radio" id="${jvar_id}" name="${jvar_name}" title="${jvar_text}" value="${jvar_value}" checked="checked" 
               onchange="${jvar_onchange}"
               onclick="${jvar_onchange}">
            ${jvar_text}
          </input>
       </label>
    </j:if>
    <j:if test="${jvar_value != jvar_checked_value}">
       <label>
          <input type="radio" id="${jvar_id}" name="${jvar_name}" title="${jvar_text}" value="${jvar_value}"
               onchange="${jvar_onchange}"
               onclick="${jvar_onchange}">
            ${jvar_text}
          </input>
       </label>
    </j:if>
</j:jelly>
result.name: ui_radio
